T02D2542:241b-2: gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang //
T02D2542:241b-3: zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2542:241b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:241b-6: 'di ltar zhes pa ni dmigs pa nye bar ston pa'i tshig go //
T02D2542:241b-7: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
T02D2542:241b-8: zhes pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D2542:241b-9: bcom ldan 'das aa las skyes zhes bya ba nyid
T02D2542:241b-10: de / de la aa ni yi ge ste rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ste /
T02D2542:241b-11: bye brag mang po'i tshul gyis mnos zhes bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:241b-12: chen po nyid kyang chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin zhing /
T02D2542:241b-13: rgyu'i tshul gyis ma lus par bstan to //
T02D2542:241b-14: gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
T02D2542:241b-15: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po nye bar
T02D2542:241b-16: mtshon pa nyid rigs las skyes pa'i phyir rig sngags
T02D2542:241b-17: te / 'dzin pa la brtsams par 'chang ba dang /
T02D2542:241b-18: bgrang ba nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir na rigs zhes bya'o //
T02D2542:241b-19: de nyid lam gyi mtshan nyid sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid bsgrub pas na /
T02D2542:241b-20: rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs //
T02D2542:241b-21: zhes pa ste blta ba ni yid kyis nges par blta'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D2542:241b-22: sems dpa' gsum gyi las 'bras bu rnams gnyis 'byung bar bstan pa ni /
T02D2542:241b-25: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub po zhes te /
T02D2542:241b-26: de yang rnam pa mang po dang ldan par rigs zhes bya'o //
T02D2542:241b-27: 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs gang zhe na snyam pa la /
T02D2542:241b-28: 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang //
T02D2542:241b-30: 'jig rten ni 'jig rten pa'i mtshan nyid yin la /
T02D2542:241b-31: bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis na snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2542:241b-32: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gong na de las gzhan
T02D2542:241b-33: med pas na chen po zhes bya ste de nyid
T02D2542:241b-34: chos kyi sku'o // phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang //
T02D2542:241b-35: zhes pa ni mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pas
T02D2542:241b-36: bcu pa'i ston pa sku phyag rgya chen po'i tshul
T02D2542:241b-37: gyis bzhugs shing / zhing khyad par can gyi bdag
T02D2542:241b-38: po mchog ces bya ste de nyid longs spyod rdzogs
T02D2542:241b-39: gyis bzhugs shing / pa'i sku'o // rin chen gtsug tor cher gtsigs nas //
T02D2542:241b-40: zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
T02D2542:242a-1: par can dang ldan pas na chen po zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2542:242a-2: 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bur gyur pas na gtsug tor zhes bya ste /
T02D2542:242a-3: gzigs pa ni de lta bu'i tshul gyis thugs la bzhag pa yin te /
T02D2542:242a-4: dgos pa'i khyad par yin pa ni 'jig rten na
T02D2542:242a-5: de la bltas nas de bya zhes zer ba de
T02D2542:242a-6: lta bu'o // de lta bu'i don dag ji lta bu gsungs she na /
T02D2542:242a-7: tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad //
T02D2542:242a-8: ces pa ni gsum pa'i don la dang po'i tshig ste /
T02D2542:242a-9: tshigs su bcad pas gsungs so zhes bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:242a-10: gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing //
T02D2542:242a-11: zhes pa ni dngos po kun gyi rigs drug dang
T02D2542:242a-12: zhar las byung ba'i 'jig rten pa'i rigs gsal ba'i
T02D2542:242a-14: de nyid gsang sngags kyi tshul du gsungs pa dang /
T02D2542:242a-15: rig pa kun gyi rgyal po ni gsang sngags rgyal po zhes bya'o //
T02D2542:242a-16: de dag rigs nges pa nyid ma yin zhing rigs gcig par bsnyen pa ni //
T02D2542:242a-17: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang //
T02D2542:242a-18: zhes gsungs te rigs thams cad bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D2542:242a-19: mi skye chos can 'di gsungs pa //
T02D2542:242a-20: zhes pa ste bdun pa dang byed pa 'dom pa'i tshig ste /
T02D2542:242a-21: chos thams cad skye ba med pa las skye bar gsungs pa dang /
T02D2542:242a-22: rnam par rtog ba'i chos mi skye bar byed pa'i chos gsungs zhes pa ste /
T02D2542:242a-23: ldan pa ni sngags kyi tshig 'di nyid la ldan par bstan pa de nyid yin la /
T02D2542:242a-24: de dag gis ni 'brel pa gsum gyi bdag nyid nges par bstan pa rdzogs so /
T02D2542:242a-26: // / da ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa las skye bar gsungs pa dang /
T02D2542:242a-27: rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs thams cad mi skye bar gsungs pa ni /
T02D2542:242a-28: aa a'a ai a'i zhes pa nas ya te na
T02D2542:242a-29: ma: zhes bya ba'i bar du yi ge drug cu
T02D2542:242a-31: 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa
T02D2542:242a-32: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i 'jam dpal
T02D2542:242a-33: ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya ba yin la
T02D2542:242a-34: / bdag nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa rnams
T02D2542:242a-35: kyis 'di ltar rang bzhin mngon par dga' ba'i gnas
T02D2542:242a-36: su stan bde ba la 'dug nas /
T02D2542:242a-37: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad mdun du bshams la /
T02D2542:242b-0: rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du @242b tha ma'i yi ge bzhag ste /
T02D2542:242b-1: de las 'od zer spros pas bcom ldan 'das 'jam
T02D2542:242b-2: dpal ye shes sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab kyi
T02D2542:242b-4: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs te blta bar bya'o //
T02D2542:242b-5: de la bdag gis sarba ta th'a ga ta manydzu
T02D2542:242b-6: shr'i dzny'a na m'urti p'a da banda nam ka ro
T02D2542:242b-8: de'i rjes la phyi dang nang gi mchod pa rnams kyis legs par mchod de /
T02D2542:242b-9: de'i mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa 'di ltar bya ste /
T02D2542:242b-10: bdag gi tshe rabs thog ma ma mchis pa nas /
T02D2542:242b-11: da ltar gyi bar du sgo gsum nas sdig pa
T02D2542:242b-12: bgyis pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
T02D2542:242b-14: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
T02D2542:242b-15: khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi dge ba
T02D2542:242b-16: la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D2542:242b-17: bdag dang de dag gi bgyi ba gcig tu gyur
T02D2542:242b-18: pas bla na med pa'i byang chub yongs su bsngo
T02D2542:242b-19: bar bya'o // khams gsum gyi sems can rnams theg
T02D2542:242b-20: pa chen po gsang sngags kyis bla na med pa
T02D2542:242b-22: bdag gis sems can mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
T02D2542:242b-23: par bya ba'i phyir theg pa chen po bla na
T02D2542:242b-24: med pa'i byang chub chen por sems bskyed do //
T02D2542:242b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D2542:242b-26: yang dag par glur blangs pa'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D2542:242b-27: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi'o zhes bya'o //
T02D2542:242b-28: de nas sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'i bsam pas byams pa dang /
T02D2542:242b-29: sdug bsngal la nye bar dmigs pa'i snying rje dang /
T02D2542:242b-30: de la mngon par dga' ba'i dga' ba dang /
T02D2542:242b-31: dmigs pa med pa'i btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2542:242b-32: de nas sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra mu: zhes
T02D2542:242b-33: bya bas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol te
T02D2542:242b-34: ; aom sarba dharm'a: sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D2542:242b-35: zhes bya bas dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid
T02D2542:242b-36: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba 'od gsal ba'i
T02D2542:242b-38: de'i rjes la ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um bsam mo //
T02D2542:242b-39: de gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D2542:243a-1: las 'od zer spros pas ji tsam 'dod pa'i rgya
T02D2542:243a-2: bar mtshams med par gyur pa'i rdo rje'i sa gzhi
T02D2542:243a-3: dang / de las logs su gyur pa'i rdo rje ra ba dang /
T02D2542:243a-4: steng du gyur pa'i rdo rje'i gur rnams mi bzang
T02D2542:243a-5: pa'i ra ba'i 'od dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o
T02D2542:243a-6: // de'i steng du hri dmar po yongs su gyur
T02D2542:243a-7: pa las padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa snying
T02D2542:243a-8: po dang ze'u 'brur ldan pa bsams te /
T02D2542:243a-9: de'i steng du ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2542:243a-10: de'i steng du tha ma'i kha dog dmar po bsam ste /
T02D2542:243a-11: de gyur pa las autpala ral gris mtshan pa kha
T02D2542:243a-12: dog dmar po de dag gi lte ba la tha
T02D2542:243a-13: ma'i yi ge gsal bar bya'o //
T02D2542:243a-14: sa bon de nas 'od zer spros pas phyogs bcu
T02D2542:243a-15: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug
T02D2542:243a-17: de dag yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das
T02D2542:243a-18: ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig
T02D2542:243a-19: phyag gnyis pa padma'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2542:243a-21: lo bcu drug pa'i cha byad can gser gyi rgyan
T02D2542:243a-22: cha lngas brgyan zhing nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od
T02D2542:243a-23: dang ldan pa / rdo rje skyil mo krung gi tshul gyis /
T02D2542:243a-24: phyag g-yas pa ni shes rab kyi ral gri autpala
T02D2542:243a-25: las 'debs pa'i tshul gyi spyi bo'i steng na 'dzin
T02D2542:243a-26: cing / phyag g-yon pa chos thams cad stong pa
T02D2542:243a-27: nyid du ston pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2542:243a-28: phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2542:243a-29: de nas rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du tha ma'i yi ge bzhag nas /
T02D2542:243a-30: de las 'od zer spros pas 'jam dpal ye shes
T02D2542:243a-31: sems dpa' yongs su grub pa nyid mdun gyi nam
T02D2542:243a-32: mkha' la spyan drangs shing zhal bsil la sogs pas
T02D2542:243a-33: mchod nas / dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas bdag nyid la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2542:243a-34: de nyid chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa ltar bsams nas /
T02D2542:243a-35: yang snying ga'i tha ma las 'od zer spros pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs nas /
T02D2542:243a-36: dbang bskur bar gsol ba btab par bya ba ni /
T02D2542:243a-37: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinydzu shri
T02D2542:243a-38: ye zhes bya bas rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyis
T02D2542:243a-39: bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D2542:243a-40: de nas chos rnams thams cad kyi //
T02D2542:243b-0: don @243b gcig gnyis med yid ldan zhing //
T02D2542:243b-1: tshogs mchog sku gsum sgrub byed pa //
T02D2542:243b-2: tshigs su bcad pa rab bstan bya //
T02D2542:243b-3: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D2542:243b-4: 'khor lo ser po rtsibs brgyad ni //
T02D2542:243b-5: gser gyi 'od dang bcas pa bsgom //
T02D2542:243b-6: lte ba la ni 'jam byed pa'i //
T02D2542:243b-7: yi ge thig le bcas pa bsgom //
T02D2542:243b-8: de yi shar phyogs rtsibs la ni //
T02D2542:243b-9: dngos kun skye ba med pa dgod //
T02D2542:243b-10: lho yi phyogs la rdul dang bral //
T02D2542:243b-11: nub phyogs don dam kun bskyed de //
T02D2542:243b-12: byang phyogs sems nyid ngo bo yin //
T02D2542:243b-13: shar lho sna tshogs dngos grub nyid //
T02D2542:243b-14: theg pa kun bral lho nub yin //
T02D2542:243b-15: de nyid rtog byed nub byang ste //
T02D2542:243b-16: chos rnams dmigs med byang shar yin //
T02D2542:243b-17: yig 'bru de dag gsal btab pa //
T02D2542:243b-18: gur gum me tog 'dra bar bsgom //
T02D2542:243b-19: rtsibs kyi bar rnams thams cad la //
T02D2542:243b-20: shar lho nas brtsams rim bzhin du //
T02D2542:243b-21: ye shes lus can snying po bstan //
T02D2542:243b-22: bdag nyid nges pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02D2542:243b-23: de nyid sangs rgyas rnams su bstan //
T02D2542:243b-24: dus gsum chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2542:243b-25: rdo rje rnon pos sdug bsngal gcod //
T02D2542:243b-26: shes rab ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs //
T02D2542:243b-27: ye shes sku yi mtshan nyid dang //
T02D2542:243b-28: ngag gi dbang phyug ces pa dgod //
T02D2542:243b-29: rtsibs kyi mu khyud thams cad du ;
T02D2542:243b-30: /'gro la phan pa'i tshul can gyi //
T02D2542:243b-31: ris drug sku yi sa bon ni //
T02D2542:243b-32: dbyangs yig bcu gnyis legs par dgod //
T02D2542:243b-35: kunda ltar kar mdangs dmar bsgom //
T02D2542:243b-36: de nas dga' ba kun bskyed pa'i //
T02D2542:243b-37: yi ge thig le bcas bsgom pa //
T02D2542:243b-38: shar gyi rtsibs la dbyings kyi lha //
T02D2542:243b-39: lho phyogs kun gyi yum du gsungs //
T02D2542:243b-40: nub phyogs rig 'dzin sa yi ste //
T02D2542:243b-41: byang phyogs gdug pa drag po ste //
T02D2542:243b-42: shar lho shes pa'i lugs can yin //
T02D2542:243b-43: lho nub sna tshogs gdung bya ste //
T02D2542:243b-45: byang shar srid pa'i 'dod chags bral //
T02D2542:243b-46: de dag padma'i rtsa ba ltar //
T02D2542:243b-47: 'od dang bcas pa bsgom par bya //
T02D2542:243b-48: rtsibs kyi bar ni thams cad du //
T02D2542:243b-49: ye shes lus can 'jam dpal dang //
T02D2542:243b-50: yi ge ni mi 'gyur ba nyid yin no //
T02D2542:243b-51: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'o //
T02D2542:243b-52: kun rdzob la rnam pa gnyis te brda'i yi ge dang /
T02D2542:244a-2: don dam pa la rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2542:244a-3: chos kyi dbyings dang ye shes kyi tshul can yin la /
T02D2542:244a-4: de dag thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis aa zhes bya ba nyid de /
T02D2542:244a-5: de thugs su chud pa la sangs rgyas yin zhing de bas na /
T02D2542:244a-6: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las 'byung //
T02D2542:244a-8: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / ces bya
T02D2542:244a-9: ba ni de ltar kun rdzob dang don dam pa
T02D2542:244a-10: gnyis ka mchog ces bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:244a-11: de la kun rdzob la ni brjod pa thams cad
T02D2542:244a-12: la aa gtso bor gyur pas na mchog ces bya
T02D2542:244a-13: ba ste / brda ni brjod pa la rag las
T02D2542:244a-14: pa'i phyir rnam par dbye ba gzhan du med do
T02D2542:244a-15: ba ste / // don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
T02D2542:244a-16: zhes pa ni de'i don sgrub par byed pas ni
T02D2542:244a-17: don chen po yin zhing de nyid yi ge dam
T02D2542:244a-18: pa zhes bya'o // de'i yi ge kun la khyab kyang dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir /
T02D2542:244a-19: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
T02D2542:244a-21: de nyid brjod pa dang bral bas na /
T02D2542:244a-22: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
T02D2542:244a-23: zhes bya zhing brjod pa thams cad kyi rgyur gyur bas na /
T02D2542:244a-24: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / ces bya'o //
T02D2542:244a-25: de nyid kyis tshig gi tshogs thams cad gsal bar byed pas na /
T02D2542:244a-26: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02D2542:244a-27: ces te kun rdzob kyi tshul du bshad do //
T02D2542:244a-28: don dam pa'i tshul du bshad pa ni gnyis su
T02D2542:244a-29: med ba'i ye shes bde ba chen po'i rnam par
T02D2542:244a-30: rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag aa yin la /
T02D2542:244a-31: de nyid bde ba zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung
T02D2542:244a-32: po dang khams dang bcas pa'i skye mched dang thams
T02D2542:244a-33: cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas na mchog ces bya'o
T02D2542:244a-34: // de nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i don chen po mi 'gyur ba nyid yin pas na /
T02D2542:244a-35: don chen yig dam pa yin //
T02D2542:244a-37: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
T02D2542:244a-38: ces bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung
T02D2542:244a-39: po dang khams dang skye mched la gnas kyang de
T02D2542:244a-40: las ma skyes pa nyid do //
T02D2542:244a-41: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
T02D2542:244a-42: zhes pa ni de nyid ngag gis brjod pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2542:244a-43: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog /
T02D2542:244a-44: ces pa ni de ltar phung po dang khams dang
T02D2542:244a-45: skye mched thams cad kyi rgyu yin zhing 'od gsal
T02D2542:244a-46: ba'i ngo bo ste mchog ces bya'o //
T02D2542:244a-47: de nyid rten la gnas kyi bar du dngos po thams cad gsal bar gyur pas na /
T02D2542:244a-48: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02D2542:244a-50: yang chos nyid stong pa nyid 'di ltar snang ba'o
T02D2542:244b-0: rnam @244b pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas
T02D2542:244b-1: na / aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / ces bya'o //
T02D2542:244b-2: don chen dam pa yi ge yin //
T02D2542:244b-3: zhes bya ba ni de nyid don dam pa'i sgrub
T02D2542:244b-4: pa mi 'gyur ba nyid yin pas na de skad
T02D2542:244b-5: ces bya'o // khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
T02D2542:244b-6: ces pa ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos po thams cad
T02D2542:244b-7: stong pa nyid kyis khyab kyang dbyer med pa'i phyir
T02D2542:244b-8: ro // de nyid tshig gi brjod pa las 'das pas na /
T02D2542:244b-9: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
T02D2542:244b-11: rten dang brten pa thams cad kyi rgyur gyur pa dang rtog pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir /
T02D2542:244b-12: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / ces bya'o //
T02D2542:244b-13: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02D2542:244b-14: ces bya ba dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa rnams
T02D2542:244b-15: chos nyid stong pa nyid mthong bas gsal bar byed
T02D2542:244b-16: pas na de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2542:244b-17: de ltar don dam pa thabs dang shes rab gnyis
T02D2542:244b-18: su med pa'i don bde ba chen po'i ye shes
T02D2542:244b-19: te / ltos pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bsgom par bya ba'am zhe na ma yin te /

T02D2542:248a-31: gyis yongs su rdzogs shing gzhan du bstan du med

T02D2542:248a-35: tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa //

T02D2542:249b-41: mchog gi dang po zhes bya ba nyid do //

T02D2542:250a-0: rnams kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang @250a * //

T02D2542:250a-8: ba la sogs pa rnams nyid kyi mtshan nyid yongs
T02D2542:250a-9: su rdzogs pa'i chos grub pa dang /

T02D2542:250a-28: sangs rgyas mnga' bdag cod pan can //
T02D2542:250a-29: spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang //
T02D2542:250a-31: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po //
T02D2542:250a-32: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs pa rnams
T02D2542:250a-33: kyi yongs 'dzin dag pa rnams rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
T02D2542:250a-34: ba'i bdag nyid du bskyed pa ni de skad ces
T02D2542:250a-35: bya zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus gsum
T02D2542:250a-36: gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sras po dam par

T02D2542:250a-38: shes pa srid 'byung skye gnas med //

T02D2542:250a-41: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'gro ba rnams nges par 'byung ba'i don du srid pa len par mdzad kyang /
T02D2542:250a-42: srid pa'i nyes pas mi gos pa yin la de

T02D2542:250b-29: gsang sangs rgyal bo don chen byed //
T02D2542:250b-31: gtsug tor chen po rmad 'byung gtsug / ces pa
T02D2542:250b-32: ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs
T02D2542:250b-33: pa ste rgyal chen rnams kyi nor bu rin po

T02D2542:251a-0: rten dang brten pa'i gzugs dngos @251a * //
T02D2542:251a-1: po sna tshogs bskyed pas ni sprul pa gsum pa ste /
T02D2542:251a-2: 'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan //
T02D2542:251a-3: sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po //
T02D2542:251a-5: mchod cing rjed pa drang srong che //
T02D2542:251a-6: zhes pa ni rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa
T02D2542:251a-7: dang ldan pa ni drang srong chen po yin la
T02D2542:251a-8: / bsnyen bkur dang mchod pa la sogs pa'i gnas
T02D2542:251a-9: su gyur pas kun gyi bstod pa gang yin pa
T02D2542:251a-10: de la de skad ces bya zhing /
T02D2542:251a-11: sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid du nges pas theg pa chen po la sbyor ba ni /
T02D2542:251a-14: de nyid stong gsum thams cad mnyam par 'gro zhing
T02D2542:251a-15: sems can rnams kyi yid skyob par mdzad pas ni
T02D2542:251a-16: / dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin //
T02D2542:251a-18: rten khyad par can gyi mtshan nyid sangs rgyas dang chos dang /
T02D2542:251a-19: dge 'dun dag pa nyid ston pa dang /
T02D2542:251a-22: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i theg pa chen po rnams mchog tu gyur pa yin la /
T02D2542:251a-24: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
T02D2542:251a-25: mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po ston pa ni /
T02D2542:251a-26: gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa //
T02D2542:251a-27: theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po //
T02D2542:251a-29: de lta bu'i theg pa chen po de rnams kyi
T02D2542:251a-30: byang chub chen po'i don yod cing sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2542:251a-31: zhing khams su 'dzin par mdzad cing ngan 'gro rnam
T02D2542:251a-33: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i go 'phang la gnas par byed pas na /
T02D2542:251a-34: don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal //
T02D2542:251a-35: 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje'i zhags //
T02D2542:251a-37: de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes spros pa
T02D2542:251a-38: dang bral ba 'gro ba rnams kyi rgyud la 'gugs
T02D2542:251a-40: de nyid brtan pa chen po'i tshul gyis mi 'gyur bar mdzad pa ni /
T02D2542:251a-41: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
T02D2542:251a-43: rgyu nges pa'i mtshan nyid las chos kyi dbyings nges
T02D2542:251a-44: par mthong ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
T02D2542:251a-45: bya la / nges pa'i tshul gyi bshad pa ste gnyis so //
T02D2542:251a-46: sems can rnams ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa ni chos kyi dbyings yin la /
T02D2542:251a-47: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa las me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
T02D2542:251b-0: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa @251b rnams kyi thugs te /
T02D2542:251b-1: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa zhe
T02D2542:251b-2: sdang chen po'i bdag nyid gdug pa rnams rjes su
T02D2542:251b-3: gzung ba'i tshul gyis 'jigs byed chen po'i skur bstan
T02D2542:251b-4: te / rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed //
T02D2542:251b-5: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:251b-6: khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa drag po dang /
T02D2542:251b-7: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams 'jigs par

T02D2542:251b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' rnams su bstan te /

T02D2542:251b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs de rnams rnam par rtog
T02D2542:251b-24: pa dang bral ba'i tshul gyis gdug pa rnams kyi
T02D2542:251b-25: mtshan nyid la zhal mche ba rab tu gtsigs pas
T02D2542:251b-26: na / keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po //
T02D2542:251b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re la yang sems
T02D2542:251b-29: bskyed pa nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i las mdzad pa'i
T02D2542:251b-31: rigs re re la yang sems bskyed pa nas phrin las kyi bar du bstan pa ni /
T02D2542:251b-32: rigs brgya rtsa brgyad nyi shu rtsa lnga ste /
T02D2542:251b-34: ha la ha la gdong brgya pa //
T02D2542:251b-36: sprul pa'i tshogs de dag gis 'gro ba rnams kyi gshin rje gsod par mdzad la /
T02D2542:251b-37: gshin rje nyid bgegs yin zhing da brjod pa ni /
T02D2542:251b-38: dbang che ba'i tshul gyis na rgyal po yin te /
T02D2542:251b-40: gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal //
T02D2542:251b-42: des zhing brtan pa'i mtshan nyid shugs chen po dang 'jigs par byed pa dang /
T02D2542:251b-43: rdo rje ltar pha rol 'joms shing rang nyid brtan
T02D2542:251b-44: pa ni rdo rje lta bu zhes khams gsum kun
T02D2542:251b-45: du grags la / de nyid snying po ye shes las 'byung ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2542:251b-46: rdo rje shugs chen 'jigs byed pa //
T02D2542:252a-0: rdo rje grags pa rdo rje'i @252a * //
T02D2542:252a-3: de lta bu'i mtshan nyid de gang la thob ce na /
T02D2542:252a-4: sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che //
T02D2542:252a-5: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:252a-6: shes rab ye shes skabs su rkyen de ma thag
T02D2542:252a-7: tu las ye shes chen po thob pa ni sgyu
T02D2542:252a-8: 'phrul yin la rlung 'gog pa'i tshul gyis bum pa
T02D2542:252a-9: ltar dkyil du brtan par dran pa ni lus kyi
T02D2542:252a-10: nang yongs su rgyal ba'i don gyis de skad ces
T02D2542:252a-11: bya la / byang chub sems dpa' de nyid rdo
T02D2542:252a-12: rje yin zhing de las skyes pa'i bde ba gnyis
T02D2542:252a-13: su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i bdag nyid du
T02D2542:252a-14: bya la / gnas pas na / rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag / ces bya'o //
T02D2542:252a-15: ye shes de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu snyam pa la /
T02D2542:252a-16: rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba //
T02D2542:252a-17: mi g-yo ral pa gcig gis bsgyings //
T02D2542:252a-19: 'bras bu'i ye shes stong pa chen pos rnam par
T02D2542:252a-20: rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag bcom zhing byang chub kyi
T02D2542:252a-21: snying po bdag nyid nam mkha' ltar spros pa thams
T02D2542:252a-22: cad dang bral ba de dang 'dra ba 'di ru
T02D2542:252a-24: ral ba'i skra bems po yin pas bems po ltar
T02D2542:252a-25: tshor ba dang bral ba'i rtse gcig cing mi g-yo
T02D2542:252a-26: bar 'dzin pa gang yin ba de la de skad
T02D2542:252a-27: ces bya / glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon //
T02D2542:252a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2542:252a-29: thugs bde ba chen po las byung ba'i zhe sdang
T02D2542:252a-30: chen po'i bdag nyid he ru ka'i gzugs kyi cha
T02D2542:252a-32: khams gsum pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam par
T02D2542:252a-33: rtog pa mi zad pa ni log par 'dren pa
T02D2542:252a-34: yin la de las thar par byas pa'i rtags su
T02D2542:252a-35: glang po che'i pags pa phyag gnyis kyis pha rol
T02D2542:252a-36: po'i tshul 'dzin pa gang yin pa de la de
T02D2542:252a-38: gtum po chen po dang ldan pa'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /
T02D2542:252a-39: rnam par gnon pa'i sgra chen pos ma rungs pa rnams 'jigs par byed pa ni /
T02D2542:252a-40: grags chen ha ha zhes sgrogs pa //
T02D2542:252a-41: hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed //
T02D2542:252a-43: de nyid bzhad pa chen po'i tshul gyis dpag tshad stong la sogs par grags par mdzad pa ni /
T02D2542:252a-44: gad mo chen po gad rgyangs can //
T02D2542:252a-45: zhes bya la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las bshad pa nyid do //
T02D2542:252a-46: rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa //
T02D2542:252a-47: zhes bya ste 'jig rten na rta'i dgod pa'i gad
T02D2542:252a-48: mo chen po la ba gad pa zhes bya ba
T02D2542:252a-49: bzhin no // de lta bu'i ye shes nam mkha'
T02D2542:252a-50: dang 'dra ba de la sku gsum gyi 'bras bu
T02D2542:252b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2542:252b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:252b-3: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi
T02D2542:252b-4: sku ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med
T02D2542:252b-5: pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba
T02D2542:252b-6: ste / de bde ba chen po dang ldan pa nyid kyis sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D2542:252b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yongs spyod rdzogs
T02D2542:252b-8: pa'i sku ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med
T02D2542:252b-9: pa'i mi mnyam pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas sa
T02D2542:252b-10: bcu'i 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po bde ba chen
T02D2542:252b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku
T02D2542:252b-13: ni stong gsum thams cad du khyab pa'i 'jigs byed
T02D2542:252b-14: chen po'i skur bzhugs pas gdul dka' rnams 'dul ba

T02D2542:252b-16: pa dang ldan pa'i skye bo rnams 'dul ba'i phyir
T02D2542:252b-17: dang / / rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che //
T02D2542:252b-18: rdo rje drag po dga' ba che //
T02D2542:252b-20: de dag sku dang thugs rdo rje ltar mi 'gyur
T02D2542:252b-21: ba nyid las gsung 'bar ba'i h'um ste chen po
T02D2542:252b-22: h'um zhes sgrogs te zhes bya'o //
T02D2542:252b-23: mtshon du rdo rje mda' thogs pa //
T02D2542:252b-24: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sku
T02D2542:252b-25: gsum gyi rdo rjes 'gro ba mtha' dag dbang du
T02D2542:252b-26: mdzad pa ni mda' zhes bya'o //
T02D2542:252b-27: drag po'i phrin las kyis 'gro ba rnams kyi srog gcod par mdzad pas na /
T02D2542:252b-28: rdo rje ral gri ma lus gcod //
T02D2542:252b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyas pa'i phrin las kyis sems can rgyas par mdzad pa ni /
T02D2542:252b-31: rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can //
T02D2542:252b-32: zhes bya ste bde ba dang longs spyod phun sum
T02D2542:252b-33: tshogs pa'i bdag nyid ni yid du 'ong zhing nges
T02D2542:252b-34: par dga' bas na rdo rje zhes bya zhing //
T02D2542:252b-35: de lta bu'i mtshan nyid bdag tu 'dzin pa 'khyud pa ni bde ba'i sgrar brjod pa'o //
T02D2542:252b-36: zhi ba'i phrin las kyis khams gsum pa zhi bar
T02D2542:252b-37: mdzad pa ni nad dang rnam par 'tshe ba la
T02D2542:252b-38: sogs pa gnod par byed pa dang /

T02D2542:252b-43: zhe sdang chen po'i bdag nyid khro bo'i rgyal po de'i spyan ni //
T02D2542:252b-44: rdo rje gcig pu g-yul sel ba //

T02D2542:253a-2: rtse gcig pa lta bu gang la mnga' ba de
T02D2542:253a-3: la / rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzad //
T02D2542:253a-4: skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste //
T02D2542:253a-6: de lta bu'i khro bo'i rgyal po des log pa'i
T02D2542:253a-7: nga rgyal chen po dang ldan pa bdud dang dbang
T02D2542:253a-8: phyug la sogs pa theg pa chen po sngags kyi

T02D2542:253a-15: lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can //
T02D2542:253a-16: rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu'i lus //
T02D2542:253a-17: zhes pa ni khro bo'i rgyal po de'i sku'i ba

T02D2542:253a-19: pa nyid dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams

T02D2542:253a-23: sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse //

T02D2542:253a-26: rje rtse gcig pa ltar gug pa lta bu nyi
T02D2542:253a-27: tshe 'dra bar gnas so zhes bya bar dgongs so
T02D2542:253a-28: // las las grub pa'i tshul du pags par bstan yang /
T02D2542:253a-29: rdo rje'i snying po pags pa mkhregs //
T02D2542:253a-31: khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyi pags pa ni rdzas
T02D2542:253a-32: kyi rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan par bstan to
T02D2542:253a-33: // khro bo'i rgyal po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa

T02D2542:253a-39: zhes gsungs pa ste rdo rje rtse gsum pa rab

T02D2542:253a-42: rna ba g-yas pa dang ltag pa dang /
T02D2542:253a-43: rna ba g-yon pa rnams su brgyan cing rdo rje
T02D2542:253a-44: phreng ba'i mtshan nyid kyis dbu 'khyud 'khor du bcings
T02D2542:253a-45: pa gang yin pa de la da skad ces bya'o
T02D2542:253a-46: // gang rgyangs ha ha nges par sgrogs //

T02D2542:253a-48: gtum po chen po'i rta skad kyis stong gsum thams cad du khyab pa nyid do //

T02D2542:253b-4: // // yam 'du byed rlung gi khams dang /
T02D2542:253b-5: ra tshor ba me'i khams dang /
T02D2542:253b-7: lam gzugs sa'i khams rnams ni /
T02D2542:253b-12: lus kyi bya ba dbang po drug dang /

T02D2542:253b-17: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba //
T02D2542:253b-19: de dag nyid sgra brjod pa bzhin du 'jig rten
T02D2542:253b-20: pa dang mtshungs par rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i dngos por

T02D2542:253b-22: nyid du gcig pa skye ba med pa aas bstan

T02D2542:253b-24: zhes bya la de nyid nam mkha'i khams thams cad
T02D2542:253b-25: du brjod pa bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2542:253b-26: khyab pa gang yin pa de la /
T02D2542:253b-27: nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D2542:253b-29: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog / ces bya
T02D2542:253b-30: ba nyid ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'di nyid

T02D2542:253b-32: de ltar stong pa nyid sgra'i don dang ldan zhing

T02D2542:253b-36: bo nges pa lnga'i tshul du bshad pa ste gsum

T02D2542:253b-43: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //

T02D2542:253b-51: ces bya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni chos

T02D2542:254a-9: yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2542:254a-10: de nyid theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig gis don mdzad dam /
T02D2542:254a-11: de lta na ni nyan thos la sogs pa rjes
T02D2542:254a-12: su mi 'dzin pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D2542:254a-13: rgyas yin par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D2542:254a-15: chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan //
T02D2542:254a-16: chos kyi gand'i sgra bo che //
T02D2542:254a-18: de la chos ni mngon par mtho ba thag ring por rab tu bsgrags pa nyid du ste /
T02D2542:254a-19: dpe'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad rjes su 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02D2542:254a-20: dge 'dun de ni so so skye bo gzhan la
T02D2542:254a-21: med cing dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar mdzad
T02D2542:254a-22: pa nyid do // de yang 'di'i tshul gyis 'phags
T02D2542:254a-23: pa nyan thos rnams kyang rjes su 'dzin par mdzad
T02D2542:254a-24: do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D2542:254a-25: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni phung po
T02D2542:254a-26: lhag ma med par mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las
T02D2542:254a-28: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po //
T02D2542:254a-30: 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa ni theg pa chen
T02D2542:254a-31: po'i rigs can du nyan thos kyi rigs can tsam
T02D2542:254a-32: zhig la chos ston nam zhen ma yin par gsungs
T02D2542:254a-33: pa ni / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi rnga bo che //
T02D2542:254a-35: phyogs bcu ni ma lus pa'i don yin la rnga
T02D2542:254a-36: ni de dag thams cad la rab tu bsgrags pa
T02D2542:254a-37: ste / rigs ma nges pa dag kyang rjes su 'dzin pa nyid do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D2542:254a-38: gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste //
T02D2542:254a-39: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yongs su rdzogs pa yin te /
T02D2542:254a-40: de 'dus byas pa'i gzugs su med pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D2542:254a-41: kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag nyid du sgrub
T02D2542:254a-43: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i chos kyi skur grub la /
T02D2542:254a-44: sbrul pa'i skus 'gro ba drug gi rigs kyi gtso bor gyur pa dang /
T02D2542:254a-45: rkyen gyi rjes su 'dul ba'i gzugs rnam pa sna
T02D2542:254a-46: tshogs rnams skyob pa chen po'i sku las byung ba
T02D2542:254a-47: ni / sna tshogs gzugs can las skyes //
T02D2542:254a-49: gzugs kyi sku dang po me long g-ya' dag pa'i
T02D2542:254b-0: rang bzhin @254b gyi gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D2542:254b-1: par snang zhing / de las dri ma dag smra brjod la sogs pa nyid kyis sel ba ltar /
T02D2542:254b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes bya'i sgrib pa
T02D2542:254b-3: ma lus pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la
T02D2542:254b-4: snang zhing / de'i chos de'i ting nge 'dzin gyis grangs med par gyur par mdzad /
T02D2542:254b-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang nyid kyi sgrib pa rnam par sel bar mdzad pa ni /
T02D2542:254b-6: gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal //
T02D2542:254b-8: de nyid me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar gzugs brnyan thams cad snang bar mdzad pas na /
T02D2542:254b-9: gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po //
T02D2542:254b-11: sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'i chos dam pa de
T02D2542:254b-12: la phyi rol gyi rnam par g-yeng ba rnams kyi
T02D2542:254b-14: tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i bstan pa
T02D2542:254b-15: bas khyad par du gyur cing khams gsum pa thams
T02D2542:254b-16: cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na /
T02D2542:254b-17: tshugs pa med cing che bar grags //
T02D2542:254b-18: khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste //
T02D2542:254b-19: zhes bya zhing de nyid 'phags pa rnams kyi nges pa'i la ma du gyur pa dang /
T02D2542:254b-20: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa ni /
T02D2542:254b-21: 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas //
T02D2542:254b-23: de ltar gsung yongs su dag pa las grub pa'i yon tan bstan pa ni /
T02D2542:254b-24: dar ba chen po chos kyi tog / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:254b-25: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba'i ye shes chen po
T02D2542:254b-26: dang rgyun gyi ye shes chen po thob par gyur
T02D2542:254b-27: pa de ni ba dan chen po ltar rdzu 'phrul
T02D2542:254b-28: dang / mngon par shes pas nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
T02D2542:254b-29: khams gsum gnas kyi gong na de las med pa'i
T02D2542:254b-30: gtsug gi nor bu ltar mtho ba gang yin pa
T02D2542:254b-31: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2542:254b-32: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bcud kyis len yongs su grub pa'i nyi ma dang /
T02D2542:254b-33: zla ba ji srid gnas kyi bar du khams gsum
T02D2542:254b-34: na lo bcu drug pa 'dra ba'i cha byad du
T02D2542:254b-35: 'dug pa ni / 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig / ces bya'o //
T02D2542:254b-36: des so so'i skye bo tha ma pa'i tshe rabs
T02D2542:254b-37: dpag tu med par gnas shing skye dgu rnams kyi
T02D2542:254b-39: gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i ba dag / ces bya'o //
T02D2542:254b-40: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad ltar 'od gang ba dang /
T02D2542:255a-0: yan lag dang nying lag mdzes @255a * //
T02D2542:255a-1: shing rgyas par gyur pa de la /
T02D2542:255a-2: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba //
T02D2542:255a-3: zhes bya zhing de nyid khams gsum pa thams cad
T02D2542:255a-4: kyi bu gcig pa ltar yid du 'ong zhing thig
T02D2542:255a-5: le mchog la sogs pa 'gugs par mdzad pa ni
T02D2542:255a-6: / sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
T02D2542:255a-8: de lta bu'i bdag nyid chen po'i gnas sbyor ba des nyi ma dang /
T02D2542:255a-9: zla ba gnas kyi bar du 'jig rten du gnas
T02D2542:255a-10: na theg pa chen po'i sems can thams cad grol
T02D2542:255a-12: theg pa chen po'i zab mo'i don ston cing phyi dang nang gi nad dang /
T02D2542:255a-13: 'jigs pa thams cad dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang bral bar gyur pa ni /
T02D2542:255a-14: 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te //
T02D2542:255a-17: de lta bu'i rdo rje slob dpon de 'gro ba mtha' dag gi mgon du gyur cing /
T02D2542:255a-18: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas sems can rnams la thugs brtse bar mdzad pas ni /
T02D2542:255a-19: mgon skyob 'jig rten yid gcugs pa //
T02D2542:255a-20: zhes bya zhing skyabs thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas bla na med pa nyid kyis na /
T02D2542:255a-21: skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med //
T02D2542:255a-23: de ltar 'jig rten ba'i dngos grub smon par bstan nas /
T02D2542:255a-24: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bstan pa ni /
T02D2542:255a-25: nam mkha'i khams la longs spyod pa //
T02D2542:255a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:255a-27: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni nam mkha'i mtha'
T02D2542:255a-28: dang mnyam par 'gro ba'i don la mngon par spyod
T02D2542:255a-29: pa la de skad ces bya la /
T02D2542:255a-30: de nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyid de /
T02D2542:255a-31: de yang ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa zad pa med pa'i rgya mtshor gyur pa ni /
T02D2542:255a-32: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho //
T02D2542:255a-34: de ltar ye shes spros pa dang bral ba'i mtshan
T02D2542:255a-35: nyid kyang 'gro ba rnams yid kyi rnam par shes
T02D2542:255a-36: pa ma rig pa'i sbubs kyis g-yogs pa thams cad
T02D2542:255a-37: dang shes rab kyi bde ba chen pos 'byed pa'i
T02D2542:255a-38: phyir na / ma rig pa'i sbubs 'byed pa zhes
T02D2542:255a-39: bya zhing de nyid srid pa'i dra ba nyid do
T02D2542:255a-40: phyir na / // de rab tu 'joms pa gang yin pa de la /
T02D2542:255a-41: srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po //
T02D2542:255a-43: de lta bu'i srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i
T02D2542:255a-44: rkyen gyis yang nas yang du 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal
T02D2542:255a-45: ba ni nyon mongs pa yin la /
T02D2542:255a-46: de lta bu'i ye shes kyi chu bos zhi bar byed pa ni /
T02D2542:255a-47: nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa //
T02D2542:255b-0: zhes bya @255b zhing de la dus kyi ye shes
T02D2542:255b-1: chen po dang ldan pas rtag par bsgrubs shing de
T02D2542:255b-2: yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar rgyun gyi ye shes 'bras
T02D2542:255b-3: bu chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor
T02D2542:255b-4: ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin
T02D2542:255b-5: pa de ni / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin //
T02D2542:255b-7: de lta bu'i srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa 'khor
T02D2542:255b-8: ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal ba de ga las thob
T02D2542:255b-9: ce na / ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can //
T02D2542:255b-10: zhe bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:255b-11: ye shes kyis dbang bskur ba ni /
T02D2542:255b-12: ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can //
T02D2542:255b-14: bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid du gnas pas bdag
T02D2542:255b-15: gi bag chags kyi dri ma thams cad dag par
T02D2542:255b-17: bde ba chen po de nyid rdo rje nor bu'i
T02D2542:255b-18: kha nas spyi gtsug gi dbu rgyan du 'khor ba'i
T02D2542:255b-20: de nyid dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2542:255b-21: cad kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' yin la
T02D2542:255b-22: / de bdag rang gi dpral ba'i rgyan du rgyas btab pa ni /
T02D2542:255b-23: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs //
T02D2542:255b-25: sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi //
T02D2542:255b-26: zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2542:255b-27: pa chen po dbu rgyan byas pa la dga' ba
T02D2542:255b-28: dang mchog gi dga' ba dang bral ba'i dga' ba
T02D2542:255b-29: gsum ni rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir sdug bsngal
T02D2542:255b-30: yin la / de dag rab tu zhi ba gang
T02D2542:255b-31: yin pa de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba
T02D2542:255b-32: zhes bya bar dgongs te de nyid nges par bstan
T02D2542:255b-33: yin la / pa ni / gsum sel ba mtha' yas grol gsum thob //
T02D2542:255b-34: ces gsungs la dga' ba dang mchog gi dga' ba dang bral ba'i dga' ba gsum bsal ba las /
T02D2542:255b-35: bde ba chen po mtha' yas spros pa dang bral bar gyur cing /
T02D2542:255b-36: de ltar 'jig rten sdug bsngal las thar pa ni grol zhes bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:255b-37: rgyu dang 'bras bu las grol zhing lhan cig skyes
T02D2542:255b-38: pa'i bde ba chen po thob po zhes bya ba
T02D2542:255b-39: nyid do // de lta bu nyid las dang nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2542:255b-40: shes bya dang skye ba'i sgrib pa thams cad nges par sgrol ba ni /
T02D2542:255b-41: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol //
T02D2542:255b-43: de nyid nam mkha' ltar brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i
T02D2542:255b-44: dngos po thams cad las mnyam pa nyid du khyab
T02D2542:255b-46: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
T02D2542:255b-48: de la gong gi mtshams sbyar ba ni /
T02D2542:256a-1: la sogs pa bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i rnam
T02D2542:256a-2: par rtog pa'i dri ma thams cad las 'das par
T02D2542:256a-3: gyur pa ni / nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das //
T02D2542:256a-5: de las gzhan gyi sems rig pa mtha' dag rig
T02D2542:256a-6: par gyur pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su
T02D2542:256a-7: dag par gyur pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
T02D2542:256a-8: pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'bras bu
T02D2542:256a-9: rtogs par gyur cing de nyid rgyud pa dpag tu
T02D2542:256a-10: med pa'i tshul gyis na dus med pa zhes bya
T02D2542:256a-11: la de ltar rtogs pa ni /
T02D2542:256a-12: dus gsum du med rtogs pa po //
T02D2542:256a-14: sems can kun gyi klu chen po //
T02D2542:256a-15: zhes pa ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad
T02D2542:256a-16: la chos kyi sbyin pa'i char rab tu 'bebs pa
T02D2542:256a-17: ni klu yin la khams gsum pa thams cad du
T02D2542:256a-18: khyab par 'gyur ba ni chen po zhes bya ba
T02D2542:256a-19: nyid do // chos kyi nges par legs pa de
T02D2542:256a-20: nyid kyis so so skye bo rnams lhag pa'i tshul
T02D2542:256a-21: khrims dang shes rab la sogs par 'jig rten 'di
T02D2542:256a-22: dang pha rol tu phyin par gyur pa ni /
T02D2542:256a-23: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod //
T02D2542:256a-25: de nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar
T02D2542:256a-26: pa grol bar mdzad cing stong pa nyid kyi mtshan
T02D2542:256a-27: nyid la rab tu gnas pa ni /
T02D2542:256a-28: lus kun las ni rab grol ba //
T02D2542:256a-29: nam mkha'i mtha' la rab gnas pa //
T02D2542:256a-31: de ltar 'bras bu chen po yon tan dang bcas
T02D2542:256a-32: pa dang snod rnam par dag pa zab mo'i tshul
T02D2542:256a-33: du bstan nas / de'i don nyid ma 'ongs pa'i
T02D2542:256a-34: sems can rnams 'di lta bu yongs su gzung bar
T02D2542:256a-35: bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir na /
T02D2542:256a-36: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //
T02D2542:256a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2542:256a-38: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams
T02D2542:256a-39: cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa ni byang chub sems
T02D2542:256a-40: yin te / de bskyed pa ni yid bzhin nor
T02D2542:256a-41: bu ltar dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa
T02D2542:256a-42: gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing
T02D2542:256a-43: yin te / // de nyid theg pa chen por sems bskyed pa yin la /
T02D2542:256a-44: de las khyad par du theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags su sems bskyed pa ni /
T02D2542:256a-45: khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog / ces bya
T02D2542:256a-46: ste de la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D2542:256a-47: pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar gyur pa ni
T02D2542:256a-48: / dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste //
T02D2542:256a-50: de'i rjes la ngag dang yid kyi rten du gyur
T02D2542:256a-51: pa lus rnam par dag par byed pa bum pa'i
T02D2542:256b-0: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / ces gsungs @256b te ;
T02D2542:256b-1: de la bum pa ni lus kyi dri ma dang
T02D2542:256b-2: rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag zhi bar byed pa yin
T02D2542:256b-3: la / 'jig rten pa'i dbang phyug chen po la
T02D2542:256b-4: sogs pa'i srid srung gi bu zhes khyad par du
T02D2542:256b-5: gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D2542:256b-6: la / bya zhing / de nyid kyi sdug bsngal nges par 'jil ba dang /
T02D2542:256b-7: 'bras bu yongs su grub pa'i don byed pas na /
T02D2542:256b-8: byed pa sems can don byed pa //
T02D2542:256b-10: de lta bu'i don byed pa'i tshul ni bde ba dang ldan par phan 'dogs pa dang /
T02D2542:256b-11: srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs rnams skyob pa'i grogs su gyur pas na /
T02D2542:256b-12: phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa //
T02D2542:256b-13: zhes bya zhing de nyid kyi dus de kho na
T02D2542:256b-14: nyid ces pa ltar mi dge ba'i mtshan nyid yid
T02D2542:256b-15: du mi 'ong ba dor ba dang /
T02D2542:256b-16: dge ba'i mtshan nyid yid du 'ong ba'i rgyu de la bkod pa ni /
T02D2542:256b-17: bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la //
T02D2542:256b-19: de lta bu'i de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi mngon
T02D2542:256b-20: par rtogs pa thams cad thob par byed pa dang
T02D2542:256b-21: / yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid las mi 'da' ba'i phyir na /
T02D2542:256b-22: khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan //
T02D2542:256b-23: zhes bya la gong ma mnyes brten pa'i dus shes pa dang /
T02D2542:256b-24: dngos gzhi legs par sgrub pa'i gsal ba'i dus shes pa ni /
T02D2542:256b-25: dus shes sems can dbang po shes //
T02D2542:256b-26: zhes bya ste de nyid snod dang rgyu dang 'bras
T02D2542:256b-27: bu rnam par dag pa nyid du rtogs pa ni
T02D2542:256b-28: ; rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po //
T02D2542:256b-30: de ltar 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D2542:256b-31: yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa rnams dang
T02D2542:256b-32: ldan zhing gong nas gong du 'bras bu chen po
T02D2542:256b-34: yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes //
T02D2542:256b-35: zhes bya zhing bum pa dang gsang dbang dang shes
T02D2542:256b-36: rab ye shes dang rgyu rnam par dag pa dang
T02D2542:256b-37: / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa rnams bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid kyis srid pa dang /
T02D2542:256b-38: mi dge ba'i tshogs mtha' dag dang /
T02D2542:256b-39: bdud dang dbang phyug dang nad dang rims la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa dang /
T02D2542:256b-40: yid du 'ong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan
T02D2542:256b-41: bar byed pa ni 'jig rten na bkra shis pa
T02D2542:256b-42: zhes zer la de'i phyir na /
T02D2542:256b-43: chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung //
T02D2542:256b-44: bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
T02D2542:256b-45: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge / zhes gsungs
T02D2542:256b-46: te de ltar dbang dang rgyu dang 'bras bu ni
T02D2542:256b-47: shes pa lnga yin par bstan la le'u dang bo
T02D2542:257a-2: bkra shis su ni brjod pa ni //
T02D2542:257a-3: lus dag nas ni rdzogs pa'i mthar //
T02D2542:257a-4: shis pa lnga ru bshad pa yin //
T02D2542:257a-6: de nyid 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa
T02D2542:257a-7: chu bo'i rlabs bzhin du yang nas yang du 'das
T02D2542:257a-8: pas ngal bar gyur pa gang yin pa de la
T02D2542:257a-9: shis pa chen po'i tshul gyis dbugs 'byin par byed
T02D2542:257a-10: cing rab tu dga' ba'i ston mos tshim par byed
T02D2542:257a-11: pa dang / srid pa'i rkyen gyis skyo bar gyur pa las rgal ba dang /
T02D2542:257a-12: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rol mos sangs rgyas par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni /
T02D2542:257a-13: dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //
T02D2542:257a-14: dga' chen rol mo chen po ste //
T02D2542:257a-16: de ltar theg pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang dam
T02D2542:257a-17: pa thob pa las gyur pa la lha dang mi
T02D2542:257a-18: la sogs pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po thams
T02D2542:257a-19: cad kyis rab tu bstod par gyur pa ni //

T02D2542:257a-31: / pa dang / bdag nyid la thar pa chen

T02D2542:257a-33: pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog gam gtso bo zhes
T02D2542:257a-34: / pa dang / bya ste / de'i phyir na /

T02D2542:257a-36: zhes bya la rab tu brgyud pa'i dbang dam pa
T02D2542:257a-37: de nyid dman dang mi'i dbang phyug la sogs pa

T02D2542:257a-46: rnam bar rtog pa'i don ni 'jigs pa chen po

T02D2542:257b-1: gtsug phud phud bu lcang lo can //

T02D2542:257b-3: 'khor ba'i bdag nyid du yang nas yang du skye
T02D2542:257b-4: bar 'gyur ba ni 'dzag pa zhes bya ba la

T02D2542:257b-6: rnam par snang mdzad de rab kyi bdag nyid gtso

T02D2542:257b-10: pa dang / ces bya zhing / ral pa munydza cod pa na thogs //

T02D2542:257b-12: ral ba'i munydza zhes bya ba nyid yin la ral pa'i sgras ni bems por brjod la /
T02D2542:257b-13: bems po rtog pa dang bral ba'i don gyis sangs
T02D2542:257b-14: rgyas nges par 'byin pa mang po yang nas yang

T02D2542:257b-16: bos mchog tu 'dud par byed pa gang yin pa

T02D2542:257b-18: de nyid sku lnga dang ye shes lnga dang 'byung

T02D2542:257b-31: bdag po rnam par snang mdzad dang /

T02D2542:257b-34: yang de bzhin du go bar bya'o //

T02D2542:257b-36: spyi bor yongs su 'dzin pa rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D2542:257b-37: de nyid mu stegs la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs las
T02D2542:257b-38: khyad par du gyur cing rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs

T02D2542:257b-44: mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po pa //
T02D2542:257b-45: tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog / ces bya
T02D2542:257b-46: la du: kha la sogs pa'i 'gog pa ni dka'

T02D2542:258a-1: // rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dgag pa ni thub pa chen po ste de'i phyir na /

T02D2542:258a-17: sdug bsngal las grol ba dang thar pa ni bde
T02D2542:258a-18: 'gro'i mtshan nyid du gnas pa dang /

T02D2542:258a-21: grol ba'i lus zhes bya ba yin la /
T02D2542:258a-22: rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de
T02D2542:258a-23: bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa de nyid phung
T02D2542:258a-24: po lhag ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2542:258a-25: kun du rtog pa dang mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur pa ni /
T02D2542:258a-28: legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye //
T02D2542:258a-30: bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa //
T02D2542:258a-31: zhes pa la de la sdug bsngal ni rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag yin la /
T02D2542:258a-32: de nyid la bde bar 'dzin pa'i sgo nas bde ba ste /
T02D2542:258a-33: de dag thams cad mthar bsal ba //
T02D2542:258a-35: chags bral lus las 'das pa po //
T02D2542:258a-37: zab mo'i chos theg pa chen po'i sgra grags par
T02D2542:258a-38: gyur pa 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa'i dgra
T02D2542:258a-39: bcom pa'i bdag nyid las 'das pa zhes bya zhing

T02D2542:258a-41: 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa bgrang du med pa'i phyir /
T02D2542:258a-42: thub pa med pa dpe med pa //

T02D2542:258a-48: shing khams gsum thams cad khyab par gyur pa ni

T02D2542:258b-2: bon thams cad dang bral zhing ngag gi brjod pa
T02D2542:258b-4: phra zhing zag med sa bon bral //
T02D2542:258b-5: zhes bya la de lta bu'i bde ba chen po
T02D2542:258b-6: nyid ngan 'gro'i nyes pa dang bde 'gro'i rnam par
T02D2542:258b-8: nyan thos kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /

T02D2542:258b-11: rdul med rdul bral dri ma med //
T02D2542:258b-12: nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa //
T02D2542:258b-14: de ltar yongs su dag pa'i 'bras bu ni ma
T02D2542:258b-15: rig pa'i gnyid las 'das pa dang sad par mdzad
T02D2542:258b-16: pas na / shin tu sad pas sad pa'i bdag
T02D2542:258b-17: / ces bya la de nyid yongs su dag pa'i
T02D2542:258b-18: mngon par shes pa lngas dngos po thams cad rig

T02D2542:258b-20: pa dang don thams cad shes par gyur pa ni
T02D2542:258b-21: pas na / / kun shes kun rig dam pa po //
T02D2542:258b-23: de lta bu'i spros pa dang bral ba nyid rnam
T02D2542:258b-24: par shes pa smra ba 'ba' zhig don dam par
T02D2542:258b-25: yod par 'dod pa las rnam par 'das shing gnyis
T02D2542:258b-26: su med pa'i ye shes spros pa dang bral ba'i
T02D2542:258b-28: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das //
T02D2542:258b-29: ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba //
T02D2542:258b-30: zhes bya la de nyid thog ma tha ma med
T02D2542:258b-31: pa nas rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral
T02D2542:258b-32: zhing sus kyang ma bcos pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2542:258b-33: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub //
T02D2542:258b-34: ces bya zhing dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
T02D2542:258b-35: phrin las ni khams gsum pa thams cad grol bar
T02D2542:258b-37: de nyid theg pa chen po'i mchog 'dis grol bar byed pa'i phyir na ;
T02D2542:258b-38: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa //
T02D2542:258b-40: de ltar yongs su dag pa'i bum pas gnyis su
T02D2542:258b-41: med pa'i bde ba chen po gsal bar byas pa
T02D2542:258b-42: ni / sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
T02D2542:258b-43: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:258b-44: de la gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen po
T02D2542:258b-45: de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa nas
T02D2542:258b-46: mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin yin pa de
T02D2542:258b-47: la de skad ces bya zhing /
T02D2542:258b-48: de nyid chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul
T02D2542:258b-49: pa'i sku la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang
T02D2542:258b-51: rgyu dang rkyen gang gis ma bskyed pa'i phyir na /
T02D2542:258b-52: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //

T02D2542:259a-1: ma dang bral ba gsal bar gyur pa dang sprul
T02D2542:259a-2: pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa 'byung ba'i rten du
T02D2542:259a-3: gyur pa dang / dngos grub rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rten du gyur pa dang /
T02D2542:259a-4: ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir na /
T02D2542:259a-5: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
T02D2542:259a-6: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2542:259a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnam par dag pa so
T02D2542:259a-9: sor rtog pa'i ye shes de yang 'jam dpal zhes
T02D2542:259a-10: bya ba nyid yin par bstan pa ni //
T02D2542:259a-11: tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che //
T02D2542:259a-13: 'jam dpal zhes bya ba brdas mtshon pa yang shes
T02D2542:259a-14: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phul du byung
T02D2542:259a-15: ba'i bdag nyid don nges par rdzogs pa'i tshig gi

T02D2542:259a-18: ces bya'o // de ltar rdo rje de nyid rab

T02D2542:259a-26: kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyir na

T02D2542:259a-28: smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas //
T02D2542:259a-29: smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med //
T02D2542:259a-31: ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku de
T02D2542:259a-32: ni khams gsum thams cad kyi lta bas chog mi
T02D2542:259a-33: shes pa dang gang dang gang gis bltas pa de
T02D2542:259a-34: dag thams cad kyi sems kyi gdung bsel ba'i phyir
T02D2542:259a-35: na // kun du lta ba mchog tu dga' //
T02D2542:259a-36: zhes bya la sku de nyid las 'od zer sna
T02D2542:259a-37: tshogs pas stong gsum thams cad khyab pa'i phyir na
T02D2542:259a-38: / gzig brjid phreng ba lta na sdug / ces bya'o //
T02D2542:259a-39: de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku dang gsung bshad nas /
T02D2542:259a-40: yongs su rdzogs pa'i thugs bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D2542:259a-43: de la dpal be'u ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D2542:259a-44: bzhin padma'i lcags kyu ltar snying po kha phyir blas
T02D2542:259a-45: pa ste / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs de yang
T02D2542:259a-46: rnam par rtog pa dang bral zhing mi 'gyur pa'i
T02D2542:259a-47: mtshan nyid du gnas pa las gdul bya rnams mngon
T02D2542:259a-48: par 'dul ba'i tshul gyis rigs bzhi'i dag nyid du
T02D2542:259a-49: 'gro ba rnams snang bar gyur pa de la de

T02D2542:259a-55: bzhin gshegs pa'i yid bzhin nor bu rin po che

T02D2542:259b-7: ba'i phyir zug rdu yin la de rtsa ba nas
T02D2542:259b-8: 'byin pas na / sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste //
T02D2542:259b-9: zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med //

T02D2542:259b-14: dang ljon shing la sogs so so yin la /

T02D2542:259b-18: tshogs pa rnams zhi bar byed pa gang yin pa

T02D2542:259b-21: nad do cog gi dgra che ba /
T02D2542:259b-23: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams thams

T02D2542:259b-28: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pas 'gro

T02D2542:259b-30: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //

T02D2542:259b-32: med pa rnams su nam mkha'i khams dang 'dra bar
T02D2542:259b-34: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par //
T02D2542:259b-35: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
T02D2542:259b-37: 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste //
T02D2542:259b-38: zhes bya ba de la nyi ma gcig ni skad
T02D2542:259b-39: cig ma'i bye brag mi shes pa rnams la myur
T02D2542:259b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi skad cig ma gcig
T02D2542:259b-42: la nam mkha'i mthar thug thams cad bgrod par gyur
T02D2542:259b-43: pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya
T02D2542:259b-44: zhing / de nyid byams pa dang thugs rje'i bdag
T02D2542:259b-45: nyid kyis 'gro ba rnams la snying po'i don ston

T02D2542:259b-48: dpal ldan padma gar gyi bdag / ces bya ba
T02D2542:259b-49: 'dis ni padma'i rigs kyi bdag nyid so sor rtog
T02D2542:259b-50: pa'i ye shes nyid nges par gzung ba nyid do
T02D2542:259b-51: // de la le'u dang po las //
T02D2542:259b-52: dpal ldan gsung gi bdag nyid can //
T02D2542:260a-2: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te //
T02D2542:260a-3: chags pa chen por rab tu bstan //
T02D2542:260a-5: khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs //
T02D2542:260a-6: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa chen po ni
T02D2542:260a-7: 'gro ba mtha' dag gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam
T02D2542:260a-8: par rtog pa las skyob par mdzad do //
T02D2542:260a-9: de nyid grang ba'i gdung ba dang tsha ba'i gdung
T02D2542:260a-10: ba ltar gnas pas na de las skyob pa gang
T02D2542:260a-11: yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
T02D2542:260a-12: de la sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po 'byung
T02D2542:260a-13: ba'i chos kyi 'khor los bag chags kyi sa bon
T02D2542:260a-15: ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pas na /
T02D2542:260a-16: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che ;
T02D2542:260a-17: / zhes bya zhing dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
T02D2542:260a-18: pa thams cad skyed par byed pa'i rten du gyur
T02D2542:260a-19: pas na / sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba //
T02D2542:260a-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che //
T02D2542:260a-22: zhes pa ni de la rnal 'byor ni chos thams
T02D2542:260a-23: cad rang bzhin thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med
T02D2542:260a-24: pa'i bde ba chen po ste de'i rjes su 'jug
T02D2542:260a-25: pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2542:260a-26: de nyid dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2542:260a-27: cad theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos
T02D2542:260a-28: rigs gcig pa'i skye bo rnams la ston par gyur
T02D2542:260a-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig / ces gsungs te de la le'u dang po las //
T02D2542:260a-31: dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi //
T02D2542:260a-32: theg pa gcig tu gyur pa ste //
T02D2542:260a-33: gnyis dang gsum du dbyer med cing //
T02D2542:260a-35: ces gsungs te bstan pa dang theg pa zhes bya ba gcig tu dgongs so //
T02D2542:260a-36: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
T02D2542:260a-37: zhes pa ni ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid gsal
T02D2542:260a-38: bar mdzad pa ni bdud kyi tshogs mtha' dag 'joms
T02D2542:260a-39: pa dang 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa
T02D2542:260a-40: dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs
T02D2542:260a-41: su rdzogs pa'i phyir na de skad ces bya zhing
T02D2542:260a-42: dang / / de las sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun 'byung ba'i bdag por gyur pas na /
T02D2542:260a-43: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
T02D2542:260a-45: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen po
T02D2542:260a-46: ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi
T02D2542:260a-47: bdag nyid rtags kyi byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa
T02D2542:260a-48: ni / 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:260a-49: de la 'jig rten dbang phyug ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yin la /
T02D2542:260a-50: rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
T02D2542:260b-0: zhes pa ni 'phags @260b pa phyag na rdo rje
T02D2542:260b-1: yin la 'dir ston pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
T02D2542:260b-2: pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' rnams ni rim
T02D2542:260b-3: pa ji lta ba bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D2542:260b-4: dang ye shes kyi ngo bo yin te de nyid
T02D2542:260b-5: pa dang / bstan pa ni / sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //
T02D2542:260b-6: zhes gsungs te me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D2542:260b-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
T02D2542:260b-8: zhes pa ni ye shes kyi bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yin la /
T02D2542:260b-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
T02D2542:260b-10: zhes bya ba ni chos dbyings ye shes kyi bdag nyid yin zhing /
T02D2542:260b-11: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
T02D2542:260b-12: zhes pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2542:260b-13: bdag nyid yin par gsungs te mnyam pa nyid dang
T02D2542:260b-14: // bya ba grub dang phrin las kyi bdag nyid
T02D2542:260b-15: ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi
T02D2542:260b-16: yon tan dang phrin las yin pa'i phyir gud du
T02D2542:260b-18: de lta bu'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye
T02D2542:260b-19: shes kyi bdag nyid de dag rnam par dag pa'i
T02D2542:260b-20: gsang ba'i dbang la ltos par bstan pa ni /
T02D2542:260b-21: rdo rje nyi ma bde ba che //
T02D2542:260b-22: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:260b-23: de la rdo rje nyi ma ni shes rab kyi
T02D2542:260b-24: bde ba spros pa dang bral ba 'byung ba rang
T02D2542:260b-25: byung gi me tog ces bya ste thabs kyi bsam
T02D2542:260b-27: kha dog dmar ba'i phyir na nyi ma zhes bya zhing /
T02D2542:260b-28: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
T02D2542:260b-29: ces bya ba ni thabs kyi bde ba chen po
T02D2542:260b-30: rtog pa dang bral ba las byung ba byang chub
T02D2542:260b-32: de nyid shes rab kyi bsam pa las byung zhing kha dog dkar po'i zla ba zhes bya ste /
T02D2542:260b-33: de nyid rtog pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri
T02D2542:260b-34: ma med pa'i 'od dang dri ma med pa'i snang
T02D2542:260b-35: ba zhes bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:260b-36: de nyid rdo rje slob dpon gyi dga' bral las
T02D2542:260b-37: byung zhing de'i gong na lhan cig skyes pa dang
T02D2542:260b-38: mchog tu dga' ba dang po rnams yod pa'i phyir
T02D2542:260b-39: na / chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
T02D2542:260b-40: zhes gsungs la de nyid skad cig ma sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D2542:260b-41: rnam par nye ba dang rnam par smin pa dang
T02D2542:260b-42: mtshan nyid dang bral ba las byung zhing skad cig
T02D2542:260b-43: ma rnams me 'bar ba bzhin du 'dod chags 'bar
T02D2542:260b-44: ba las byung ba'i 'od 'bar ba las byung bas
T02D2542:260b-45: na / kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //
T02D2542:260b-47: de nyid sbyor ba chen po ji lta bu las byung zhe na /
T02D2542:260b-48: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2542:260b-49: zhes byung ste ji ltar sprul pa'i sku sh'akya thub
T02D2542:260b-50: pa rdo rje'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil krung du
T02D2542:260b-51: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du
T02D2542:260b-52: rdo rje rtse lnga'i mtshan nyid rdo rje rgya gram
T02D2542:261a-0: gyi @261a * // / pa ni / sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa //
T02D2542:261a-2: de nyid bdun pa'i don la dang po'i tshig go //
T02D2542:261a-3: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
T02D2542:261a-4: zhes pa ni padma ni rtag can te /
T02D2542:261a-5: sku gsung thugs yongs su rdzogs par byed rgyu'i rgyu byang chub kyi sems de la gnas shing /
T02D2542:261a-6: de nyid rtog pa chen po'i tshul gyis lnga pa dang bdun pa 'dom pa'i tshig ste /
T02D2542:261a-7: padma las skyes shing padma ru skyes zhes bya la /
T02D2542:261a-8: de nyid kyi steng gi padma dang /
T02D2542:261a-9: 'og gi padma dang zhes grags so //
T02D2542:261a-10: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
T02D2542:261a-11: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i dbang gi yon tan bshad pa ste /
T02D2542:261a-12: de la mdzod ni rdzas kyi dngos po thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin la /
T02D2542:261a-13: de ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa thams cad
T02D2542:261a-14: mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa nyid
T02D2542:261a-15: do // de nyid dngos gzhi ni /
T02D2542:261a-16: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis ting 'dzin dra ba dpag tu med pa 'chang bas na /
T02D2542:261a-19: che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags rgyal //
T02D2542:261a-20: zhes pa ni de ltar gong du bstan pa'i gsang ba'i dbang ni /
T02D2542:261a-21: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rig pa'i rtsa ba chen por gyur pa /
T02D2542:261a-22: nyan thos la sogs pa'i gtso bor gyur pas de skad ces bya la /
T02D2542:261a-23: de lta bu'i gsang ba'i mtshan nyid kyis rnam par
T02D2542:261a-24: rtog pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa
T02D2542:261a-25: dang / srid pa'i dra ba thams cad gcod pa dang /
T02D2542:261a-26: mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D2542:261a-27: theg pa chen po'i lam gyi tshul gyis sdug bsngal rnams gcod par mdzad pas na /
T02D2542:261a-28: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
T02D2542:261a-29: yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag / theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod //
T02D2542:261a-31: mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i chos //
T02D2542:261a-32: zhes bya ba ni gong du theg pa'i tshul nyid
T02D2542:261a-33: rtog pa dang bral ba'i bde ba chen po bsgom
T02D2542:261a-34: pa'i phyir dang / sdug bsngal mtha' dag gcod pa'i phyir de skad ces bya zhing /
T02D2542:261a-35: rtogs par dka' zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku 'dzin par 'dod pas na /
T02D2542:261a-36: rdo rje zab mo dzin dzik / ces bya'o //
T02D2542:261b-0: de lta bu'i bde ba chen @261b po ni shes
T02D2542:261b-1: rab kyi rang bzhin gyi sa dang pha rol tu
T02D2542:261b-2: phyin pa'i don mtha' dag phyin ci ma log par
T02D2542:261b-3: rtogs pa ni / rdo rje blo gros don bzhin
T02D2542:261b-4: rig / ces bya la de nyid pha rol tu
T02D2542:261b-5: phyin pa bcu la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin
T02D2542:261b-6: pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2542:261b-7: gsang ba'i padma chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D2542:261b-8: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sa rab tu dga' ba
T02D2542:261b-9: nas rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po go 'phang gi
T02D2542:261b-10: sa dang mthun par cha phra zhing lto ba yangs
T02D2542:261b-11: pa / ston ka'i dus zla ba yongs su rdzogs
T02D2542:261b-12: pa'i zla ba ltar dri ma dang bral bar gnas
T02D2542:261b-13: pa ni gsang ba'i rdo rje mnyam par sbyar ba'i
T02D2542:261b-14: gnas skabs ni gong nas gong du bde ba 'phel
T02D2542:261b-15: pa / ba'i phyir na // pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa //
T02D2542:261b-16: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan //
T02D2542:261b-18: de nyid dri ma dang bral zhing rnam par dag
T02D2542:261b-19: pa'i chus yang dag yang du 'khrud cing gzung ba
T02D2542:261b-20: dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral bar
T02D2542:261b-21: byed pa ni / rnam par dag pa bdag med chos //
T02D2542:261b-23: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang //
T02D2542:261b-25: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i bum pa'i nang na
T02D2542:261b-26: gnas pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes zla ba'i
T02D2542:261b-27: dkyil 'khor ltar rnam par rtog pa'i 'ching ba gdung
T02D2542:261b-28: ba chen po rims dang 'dra ba sel bar mdzad
T02D2542:261b-29: pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya
T02D2542:261b-30: la / des myur ba nyid du ye shes chen
T02D2542:261b-31: po'i mtshan nyid thob par byed cing phyag rgya bzhi'i
T02D2542:261b-32: bdag nyid dang ldan pa ni gzhon nu ma'i pra
T02D2542:261b-33: phab pa dang 'dra bar gnas pa na /
T02D2542:261b-37: gnyi ga'i rgyud thams cad bdag nyid blta ba dang /
T02D2542:261b-39: 'khyud pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshul du kun gyi rgyur gyur pa na /
T02D2542:261b-40: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog / ces bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:261b-41: rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan //
T02D2542:261b-42: zhes bya ba ni dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
T02D2542:261b-43: pa thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i gnas gsang
T02D2542:261b-45: rnam par rtog pa'i bdud kyi dpung thams cad 'joms
T02D2542:261b-46: pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya
T02D2542:261b-47: zhing / rgyud dang bral ba'i ye shes rnam pa
T02D2542:261b-48: sna tshogs pa ma lus pa 'chang bar gyur pas
T02D2542:261b-49: zhing / na / ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang //
T02D2542:262a-0: @262a * // ye shes kyi sku de rnams nyid nges par ston pa ni /
T02D2542:262a-1: kun du bzang po blo gros bzang //
T02D2542:262a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:262a-3: de la kun du bzang po ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D2542:262a-4: pa thams cad kyi thugs kun du bzang po shes
T02D2542:262a-5: rab chen po'i ngo bo ni sangs rgyas kyi sku
T02D2542:262a-6: rnams kyi gtso bo dang bzang po zhes bya ste
T02D2542:262a-7: de nyid chos kyi sku zhes bya'o //
T02D2542:262a-8: de ltar chos kyi sku las byung ba'i longs spyod
T02D2542:262a-9: rdzogs pa'i sku ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2542:262a-10: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying por gyur cing
T02D2542:262a-11: / rnam par dag pa'i 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i phyir na /
T02D2542:262a-13: zhes bya ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku las byung
T02D2542:262a-14: ba'i sprul pa'i sku ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
T02D2542:262a-15: thams cad kyi snying po yin te drag po la
T02D2542:262a-16: sogs pa'i gzugs ni rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir /
T02D2542:262a-17: sangs rgyas kun gyis snying po che //
T02D2542:262a-19: sprul pa'i sku rnam pa sna tshogs de nyid srid
T02D2542:262a-20: pa gsum po thams cad rim pa ji lta ba
T02D2542:262a-21: bzhin du 'gro ba rnams grol bar mdzad pas na
T02D2542:262a-24: de ltar so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la yang sku gsum gyi bdag nyid du bshad nas /
T02D2542:262a-25: sku gsum bdag nyid ye shes chen po de ni
T02D2542:262a-26: sku dang ye shes dang rta dang glang po che
T02D2542:262a-27: la sogs pa srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das
T02D2542:262a-28: pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gnas
T02D2542:262a-29: pa dang / dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin du 'byung ba'i phyir na /
T02D2542:262a-30: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog / dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin ;
T02D2542:262a-32: de ltar chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshul
T02D2542:262a-33: las 'gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang gis de
T02D2542:262a-34: bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyi mthu chen po dngos
T02D2542:262a-35: po rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba ni /
T02D2542:262a-36: skye med chos de sna tshogs don //
T02D2542:262a-37: zhes bya la de nyid zag pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D2542:262a-38: chos dang zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi
T02D2542:262a-39: bdag nyid du ston pa ni /
T02D2542:262a-40: chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba //
T02D2542:262a-42: shes rab chen po skad cig la //
T02D2542:262a-43: zhes bya zhing rgyu'i ye shes rnam par rtog pa
T02D2542:262a-44: thams cad dang bral ba bde ba chen po'i skad
T02D2542:262b-0: cig @262b ni shes pa thams cad kyi gtso bo'am
T02D2542:262b-2: shes rab chen po zhes bya la yongs su dag
T02D2542:262b-3: pa'i skad cig ma de la kun rdzob kyi dngos
T02D2542:262b-4: po thams cad bde ba chen po'i dngos por rtogs
T02D2542:262b-5: pa ste dngos zhes bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:262b-6: thub pa blo mchog 'byung po sel //
T02D2542:262b-7: zhes pa ni de la de lta bu'i ye shes
T02D2542:262b-8: chen po des phyin ci log gi rtog pas bskyed
T02D2542:262b-9: pa'i bag chags ni sreg par byed pa'i phyir 'byung
T02D2542:262b-10: po yin la / shes rab chen po'i mtshan nyid
T02D2542:262b-11: kyis sel bar byed pa gang yin pa de la
T02D2542:262b-13: phyi rol gyi rnam par rtog pa g-yeng ba la sogs pa bkod par mi nus pa dang /
T02D2542:262b-14: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang ba ltar dri ma
T02D2542:262b-15: dang bral ba'i bdag nyid du gnas pa dang yang
T02D2542:262b-16: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni
T02D2542:262b-17: chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid du gnas shing
T02D2542:262b-18: rab tu dang ba'i mtshan nyid de des yongs su
T02D2542:262b-20: mi g-yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang //
T02D2542:262b-22: sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa //
T02D2542:262b-23: zhes pa ni de nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D2542:262b-24: kyi don dam pa mngon sum gyi shes pa 'dra
T02D2542:262b-25: bas rtogs par byed pa'i phyir na /
T02D2542:262b-26: rab tu rtogs pa mngon sum pa de la de skad ces bya la /
T02D2542:262b-27: de nyid spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes chen
T02D2542:262b-28: po ni rnam par rtog pa'i bud shing thams cad
T02D2542:262b-29: sreg par byed pa'i phyir na me yin la /
T02D2542:262b-30: ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba dang nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'i phyir na /
T02D2542:262b-32: zhes bya ste de ltar so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni gsung nye bar 'dzin pa yin te /
T02D2542:262b-33: yon tan las ni de'i yon tan dang las yin la /
T02D2542:262b-34: de bas na mnyam pa nyid dang bya ba grub
T02D2542:262b-35: pa'i sngon du 'gro bas kun gyi dus su bshad
T02D2542:262b-36: pa yin la / de nyid nges pa lnga'i tshul du bshad pa ste bzhi pa'o //
T02D2542:262b-37: de ltar ye shes dang sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams bstan nas /
T02D2542:262b-38: da ni de rnams yon tan du 'gyur ba mnyam
T02D2542:262b-39: pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid du bshad
T02D2542:262b-40: pa ni / 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
T02D2542:263a-0: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te de nyid nga rgyal chen po'i gang zag rnams @263a * //
T02D2542:263a-1: 'dul ba'i don du nga rgyal chen po'i sku rin che 'byung ldan ni /
T02D2542:263a-2: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis gdul bya'i
T02D2542:263a-3: skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i don thams cad
T02D2542:263a-4: grub par mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de
T02D2542:263a-6: de nyid kyi nga rgyal nye bar mtshon nas 'dod
T02D2542:263a-7: chags la sogs pa thams cad nyon mongs pa nga
T02D2542:263a-9: de nyid yang dag par sbyong ba'i phyir na /
T02D2542:263a-10: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
T02D2542:263a-12: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog / ces pa
T02D2542:263a-13: ni de ltar nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yid
T02D2542:263a-14: yongs su dag pa las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
T02D2542:263a-15: shes ni bdag gzhan gyi rgyud mnyam ste /
T02D2542:263a-16: de sems can thams cad dang mtshungs pa med pa dang /
T02D2542:263a-17: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pas na de skad ces bya zhing /

T02D2542:266a-20: bton pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D2542:266a-21: nyid do // bya zhing / de nyid rnam par
T02D2542:266a-22: dag pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas skabs dang
T02D2542:266a-23: sgyu ma lta bu'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis par du
T02D2542:266a-25: dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang //
T02D2542:266a-27: de nyid sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog
T02D2542:266a-28: pa dang lam gyi bden pa las yongs su grub
T02D2542:266a-29: pa bdag nyid du gnas pa /
T02D2542:266a-30: bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can //
T02D2542:266a-32: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnam
T02D2542:266a-33: par dag pa las sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i
T02D2542:266a-34: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad du nges par ldan pa
T02D2542:266a-35: ni / shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang //
T02D2542:266a-36: zhes bya zhing de nyid chos kyi 'khor lo yongs
T02D2542:266a-37: su dag pa'i las ma rig pa la sogs pa
T02D2542:266a-38: nyid dag pa'i tshul gyi bden pa yin la des
T02D2542:266a-39: grol ba nges par ston pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin
T02D2542:266a-40: gshegs pa'i phun sum tshogs ba dang ldan pas /
T02D2542:266a-41: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
T02D2542:266a-43: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig / ces bya
T02D2542:266a-44: ba ni ye shes kyi sku'i sku dang gsung dang
T02D2542:266a-45: thugs dang ye shes dang chos kyi sku'i sku dang
T02D2542:266a-46: gsung dang thugs dang ye shes dang longs spyod rdzogs
T02D2542:266a-47: pa'i sku'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes
T02D2542:266a-48: dang sbrul pa'i sku'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang
T02D2542:266a-49: ye shes rnam par dag pa rig par gyur pa
T02D2542:266a-50: gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya la
T02D2542:266a-51: / rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa //
T02D2542:266a-52: zhes pa ni rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas skabs na

T02D2542:266b-0: kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgo @266b nas de
T02D2542:266b-1: dag thams cad rnal 'byor gyi lam gyi gnas skabs
T02D2542:266b-4: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D2542:266b-5: dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i tshul gyis rnam par phye bde la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2542:266b-6: rnam pa sangs rgyas kun rig mchog / ces bya
T02D2542:266b-7: ba ni de ltar rnam pa nyi shu mngon par
T02D2542:266b-8: byang chub pa'i bde ba chen po ni brtan pa
T02D2542:266b-9: dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad gnyis su med
T02D2542:266b-10: par rtogs shing rang rig pa'i phung po'i bde ba

T02D2542:266b-13: rang rig pa'i bde ba chen po de nyid nyan
T02D2542:266b-14: thos 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ltar bdag nyid
T02D2542:266b-15: 'ba' zhig bde ba'i rgyun dang ldan pa ma yin
T02D2542:266b-16: zhing brtan pa dang g-yo ba dang dngos pos stong
T02D2542:266b-17: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
T02D2542:266b-18: cad bde ba chen po'i gzugs kyi sprul pa dpag
T02D2542:266b-19: tu med pas khyab par byed cing /
T02D2542:266b-20: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang 'dra bas 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad pa ni /
T02D2542:266b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku //
T02D2542:266b-22: bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po //
T02D2542:266b-24: de lta bu'i bde ba chen po skad cig la
T02D2542:266b-25: dus kyi mtha'i skad cig ma dpag tu med pa
T02D2542:266b-26: thams cad bde ba chen po'i ngo bor rtogs pa
T02D2542:266b-28: skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs //
T02D2542:266b-30: bde ba chen po nyid rnam par rtog pa thams cad zad par gyur cing /
T02D2542:266b-31: gnyis su med par gyur pa ni skad cig ma'i
T02D2542:266b-32: sgrar brjod cing skad cig ma ni ye shes dang
T02D2542:266b-33: gcig tu brjod cing ksha dang na ni ma ning
T02D2542:266b-34: gi rtags te / zad cing med pa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2542:266b-35: 'dzag pa med pa zhes bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:266b-36: 'dir yang dus kyi mtha'i skad cig ma thams cad zad cing med par gyur pa dang /
T02D2542:266b-37: de nyid zag pa med pa'i bde ba nyid du
T02D2542:266b-38: gnas pas na de skad ces bya ste gang du
T02D2542:266b-40: de nyid don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis
T02D2542:266b-41: dngos po'i don mtha' dag las rig par gyur pa

T02D2542:266b-43: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
T02D2542:266b-44: 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //
T02D2542:266b-45: zhes pa ni de la nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
T02D2542:266b-46: rang rgyal gyi theg pa dang /
T02D2542:266b-47: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rnams la rang rang
T02D2542:266b-48: gi lhag pa'i shes rab kyi ngo bos don gyi
T02D2542:266b-49: dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs pa yin la /
T02D2542:267a-1: 'gro ba gang dang gang la don gyi mtshan nyid
T02D2542:267a-2: nges par gyur pa de la de skad ces bya
T02D2542:267a-3: ste / de ji lta ba bzhin du 'dir yang

T02D2542:267a-9: pa'i phyir na de skad bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:267a-10: theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
T02D2542:267a-11: theg ba gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
T02D2542:267a-13: de la theg pa gsum ni nyan thos dang /
T02D2542:267a-14: rang rgyal dang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yin la /
T02D2542:267a-15: de dag las rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2542:267a-16: lus dang ngag rnams yang dag par sbyangs pa ni
T02D2542:267a-17: lam gyi gnas skabs kyi mtshan nyid la gong nas

T02D2542:267a-19: sems yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir theg pa rnams
T02D2542:267a-20: kyi rab bam mchog chen por 'gyur ba'i rdo rje
T02D2542:267a-21: theg pa chen po'i gnas na bde ba chen po'i
T02D2542:267a-22: tshul gyis 'bras bu nyid lam du byas nas myur
T02D2542:267a-23: ba nyid du 'bras bu la gnas par byed pa
T02D2542:267a-24: ni 'bras bu'i sa la rab tu gnas so zhes
T02D2542:267a-26: de lta bu 'bras bu'i theg pa'i yon tan ji lta bu yin snyam pa la /
T02D2542:267a-27: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag / ces gsungs te /
T02D2542:267a-28: de ltar 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid rdo rje theg pa'i
T02D2542:267a-29: 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams
T02D2542:267a-30: rjes su mthun pa'i stobs kyis dag par byed pa
T02D2542:267a-31: de la de skad ces bya la /
T02D2542:267a-32: de nyid kyi las kyi rgyu dang las kyi 'bras bu thams cad zad par byed pa ni /
T02D2542:267a-33: las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa //

T02D2542:267a-36: pa yang dang yang du 'byung bar gyur pa'i rgyur
T02D2542:267a-37: gyur pas na khams zhes bya ste /
T02D2542:267a-38: de yang gsang 'dus rgyud phyi ma las /
T02D2542:267a-39: nyon mongs rdo rje bdud rtsi dag / las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D2542:267a-40: las rnams thams cad dag pa las //
T02D2542:267a-41: las las skyes pa'i 'bras bu dag / ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2542:267a-42: chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal / zhes bya
T02D2542:267a-43: ba ni chu bo ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag
T02D2542:267a-45: de las rab tu rgal zhes bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:267a-46: de lta bu'i thabs de dang shes rab de dang
T02D2542:267a-47: bde ba chen por mnyam par sbyor ba spros pa
T02D2542:267a-48: dang bral ba'i mtshan ma las yang dag par byung
T02D2542:267b-0: ba yin la / sbyor ba'i @267b dgon pa las byung ba //
T02D2542:267b-2: de ltar thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor ba

T02D2542:267b-4: pa lnga dang / srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i bas pham par gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /
T02D2542:267b-5: tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa phra mo'i nyon mongs ba ma lus pa rnams dang /
T02D2542:267b-6: de las byung ba bag chags kyi sa bon ma
T02D2542:267b-7: lus pa thams cad phyis sa bon mi 'jog pa'i
T02D2542:267b-8: tshul gyis spangs pa gang yin pa de la /
T02D2542:267b-9: nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs //
T02D2542:267b-10: bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa //
T02D2542:267b-12: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs //
T02D2542:267b-13: zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2542:267b-14: rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
