T02D2542:267b-20: don 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i byed pa gang yin
T02D2542:267b-21: bya zhing / pa de ni / don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02D2542:267b-23: de ltar de lta bu'i bde ba chen po'i stobs
T02D2542:267b-24: phyin ci log gi shes pa sna tshogs pa'i yul
T02D2542:267b-25: la mtshan ma'i dngos por 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma'i rnam
T02D2542:267b-26: par rtog pa ma lus par spangs bar gyur pa
T02D2542:267b-28: 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing //
T02D2542:267b-29: bya ba la bag chags kyi rnam par snang ba'i
T02D2542:267b-30: don rta dang glang po la sogs pa'i gnas dang
T02D2542:267b-31: / lus dang longs spyod du snang ba thams cad 'gag bar byed pa ni /
T02D2542:267b-32: rnam shes don ni 'gog bar byed //
T02D2542:267b-34: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po skyes pa
T02D2542:267b-35: dang dus mtshungs par mig la sogs pa'i dbang po
T02D2542:267b-36: thams cad dang gzugs la sogs pa'i yul thams cad
T02D2542:267b-37: 'gag par mdzad cing rang rig pa'i ye shes sad
T02D2542:267b-38: par mdzad ces par dgongs so //
T02D2542:267b-39: de lta bu'i rgyu dri ma dang bral ba'i mtshan
T02D2542:267b-40: nyid las yongs su grub pa'i 'bras bu'i dri ma
T02D2542:267b-41: dang bral pa'i bdag nyid kyi don phun sum tshogs
T02D2542:267b-42: pa bshad nas / de las byung ba gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bstan pa ni /
T02D2542:267b-43: sems can kun yid yul dang ldan //
T02D2542:267b-44: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:267b-45: de la dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni /
T02D2542:268a-0: sems can la mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i @268a * //
T02D2542:268a-1: don gang dang gang bsams pa de dang de thams

T02D2542:268a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin rlabs chen po ni

T02D2542:268a-15: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo yin la /

T02D2542:268a-17: de lta bu'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi yid la nga gnas zhes bya ba ste /

T02D2542:268a-19: nga ni de bzhin gshegs kun dang //

T02D2542:268a-30: pa'i chos la rtag tu nye bar chags shing skyes
T02D2542:268a-31: bu'i mtshan ma rtag tu che ba 'dod la /
T02D2542:268a-32: dran pa'i tshul gyis tshim par byas pa las /
T02D2542:268a-34: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa bzhin de nyid
T02D2542:268a-35: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag nyid yul la

T02D2542:268a-38: khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad yi rangs par gyur pa dang /

T02D2542:268b-1: sems can kun yid tshim par byed //
T02D2542:268b-2: sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba //

T02D2542:268b-5: spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes chen po ni
T02D2542:268b-6: shel dag pa ltar nyes pa'i skyon mtha' dag spangs
T02D2542:268b-7: pa ni / grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul pa med //
T02D2542:268b-9: 'khrul pa'i chos mtha' dag spangs pa nyid do //

T02D2542:268b-12: de ltar gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa nyid 'das pa dang /
T02D2542:268b-14: da ltar byung ba rnams kyi snod dang /
T02D2542:268b-15: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo phyin ci ma log

T02D2542:268b-21: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag nyid chos kyi sku dang /

T02D2542:268b-25: phung po lnga don dus gsum du //

T02D2542:268b-27: skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas //

T02D2542:268b-34: med cing de'i phung po lnga las nye bar mtshon
T02D2542:268b-37: snod kyi 'jig rten la sogs pa thams cad gnyis
T02D2542:268b-38: su med pa'i bde ba chen por dus gsum du

T02D2542:269a-0: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes @269a * //
T02D2542:269a-1: kyi sku gsum gyi mtshan nyid du bstan pa ni /
T02D2542:269a-2: lus med lus te lus kyi mchog / ces gsungs

T02D2542:269a-15: dang / par gyur pa / ting nge 'dzin gyi

T02D2542:269a-18: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku
T02D2542:269a-19: ste sprul pa'i sku bye ba dpag tu med pa
T02D2542:269a-20: gang dang gang du 'dul ba de dang de'i gzugs

T02D2542:269a-33: sku dang yon tan gyi bdag nyid du bshad nas
T02D2542:269a-34: / da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las
T02D2542:269a-35: sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa
T02D2542:269a-36: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes bstan pa ni /
T02D2542:269a-37: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtog bya ba //
T02D2542:269a-38: zhes gsungs te de la rtog bya ba zhes pa ni rtags can yin pas na /
T02D2542:269a-39: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D2542:269a-40: bye ba phrag du ma rnams su gdul bya rnams
T02D2542:269a-41: kyi don du snyoms par 'gro bar shes par bya
T02D2542:269a-43: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes nyid nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D2542:269a-44: sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med //
T02D2542:269a-45: ces pa ni nyan thos kyi byang chub ltar bdag
T02D2542:269a-46: nyid 'ba' zhig gi don ma yin zhing khams gsum
T02D2542:269a-47: gyi sems can thams cad kyi don ma lus par
T02D2542:269a-48: mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D2542:269a-49: bya zhing de nyid theg pa chen po gsang sngags
T02D2542:269a-50: kyi tshul las byung zhing rnam par rtog pa thams
T02D2542:269b-0: cad spangs par gyur pas @269b na ;
T02D2542:269b-1: gsang sngags las byung yi ge med //
T02D2542:269b-3: de nyid gdul bya rnams kyi don bya ba dang spyod pa dang /
T02D2542:269b-4: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gsum gyi tshul gyis dus nges par ston cing /
T02D2542:269b-5: bsgrub bar bya ba don gyi mtshan nyid ni gsang
T02D2542:269b-6: sngags thams cad kyi don 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
T02D2542:269b-7: las 'das pa'i dngos grub rnam pa sna tshogs skyed
T02D2542:269b-8: par byed pa'i don dam par byang chub kyi sems
T02D2542:269b-9: chen po gang yin pa de /
T02D2542:269b-10: gsang sngags chen po'i rigs gsum pa //
T02D2542:269b-11: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po //
T02D2542:269b-13: de ltar don dam pa byang chub kyi sems de nyid stong pa nyid kyi brdar gyur cing /
T02D2542:269b-14: rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba gang yin pa de la /
T02D2542:269b-15: thig le chen po yi ge med //
T02D2542:269b-17: de las rigs lnga dang rigs drug dang rigs brgya
T02D2542:269b-18: la sogs pa dpag tu med par 'gyur bar bstan
T02D2542:269b-19: pa ni / stong pa chen po yi ge lnga /
T02D2542:269b-20: thig le stong pa yi ge brgya //
T02D2542:269b-22: thig le ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba yin la /
T02D2542:269b-23: nam mkha' ltar stong pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D2542:269b-24: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med //
T02D2542:269b-25: ces bya ba la de rnam pa kun zhes pa
T02D2542:269b-26: ni rigs lnga dang rigs brgya'i bar du yin no
T02D2542:269b-27: // rnam pa ni stong pa zhes bya ba nyid de sngar gyi nges par bshad pa'o //
T02D2542:269b-28: de lta bu'i rnam pa dang bcas zhing rnam pa
T02D2542:269b-29: med pa dag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs
T02D2542:269b-30: pa'i bdag nyid gang las thob ce na /
T02D2542:269b-31: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
T02D2542:269b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:269b-33: de nyid dbang rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa bzhi pa nges par bstan pa nyid la /
T02D2542:269b-34: de la bcu drug gi phyed ni brgyad yin la /
T02D2542:269b-35: brgyad kyi phyed ni bzhi yin /
T02D2542:269b-36: lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes
T02D2542:269b-37: de nyid dga' ba bzhi'i bdag nyid can zhes bya
T02D2542:269b-38: bar dgongs shing / skabs 'dir thig le'i sgras ni gnyis rnam par spangs pa zhes brjod la /
T02D2542:269b-39: gnyis ni char byed pa yin te /
T02D2542:269b-42: thabs dang shes rab la sogs pa gnyis su 'dzin
T02D2542:269b-43: pa mtha' dag spangs pa bde ba chen po zhes
T02D2542:269b-45: de nyid rang gi ngo bo bstan pa ni /
T02D2542:269b-46: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
T02D2542:270a-0: de la yan lag gi dngos po'i rnam @270a * //
T02D2542:270a-2: mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad yid la
T02D2542:270a-3: med par gyur cing ngag gis brjod pa'i tshad las
T02D2542:270a-4: 'das pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D2542:270a-5: bya'o // bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can //
T02D2542:270a-9: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D2542:270a-10: dga' bral gyi dga' ba rnams kyi bla mar gyur
T02D2542:270a-11: cing gong na med pa ni rtse gcig pa'i bsam
T02D2542:270a-12: gtan yin la / brjod pa dang bral ba kun gyi mtshan nyid dam /
T02D2542:270a-13: kun gyi rnam pa spangs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
T02D2542:270a-14: de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi lam chen po'i rim pa'am /
T02D2542:270a-15: nam mkha'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i thabs kyi yan
T02D2542:270a-16: lag dpag tu med pa thams cad 'bras chen snod
T02D2542:270a-17: du sdud pa ltar dngos po kun bsdus pa'i ngo
T02D2542:270a-19: de shes pa las dngos po mtha' dag shes par gyur pa nyid dang /
T02D2542:270a-20: de nyid la mnyam par brtan pa'i tshul gyis mnyam par gzhag na bdag nyid kyi phung po dang /
T02D2542:270a-22: skye mched la sogs pa rnam par dbye ba rigs kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D2542:270a-23: sems kyi rang bzhin phyin ci ma log par rig par gyur pa gang yin pa de la /
T02D2542:270a-24: bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing //
T02D2542:270a-25: ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa //
T02D2542:270a-27: de lta bu'i bde ba chen po yongs su rdzogs
T02D2542:270a-28: pa'i mtshan nyid las 'bras bu sku gsum phun sum
T02D2542:270a-30: ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog / ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2542:270a-31: de la chos kyi sku ni mtshan ma'i spros pa
T02D2542:270a-32: thams cad dang bral zhing bde ba chen po ni
T02D2542:270a-33: rtse gcig pa'i tshul gyi ting nge 'dzin yin la
T02D2542:270a-34: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad kyi mchog
T02D2542:270a-35: tu gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad
T02D2542:270a-36: / ces bya zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2542:270a-37: cad kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni sa bcu'i
T02D2542:270a-38: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyal por gyur pas
T02D2542:270a-39: / ces bya zhing / na / longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal //
T02D2542:270a-40: zhes bya ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2542:270a-41: sprul pa'i sku ni khams gsum gyi 'gro ba'i sems
T02D2542:270a-42: can thams cad kyi don phun sum tshogs par mdzad
T02D2542:270a-43: pa ni / gdul bya'i zhing rgya chen po la
T02D2542:270b-0: mdzad @270b pa rgya chen por mdzad pa'i phyir na
T02D2542:270b-1: pa ni / / sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog / ces bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:270b-2: de ltar lhan cig skyes pa bde ba chen po'i
T02D2542:270b-3: ye shes de lta bu sku gsum gyi bdag nyid
T02D2542:270b-4: du gnas shing / sprul pa dpag tu med pa 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa ni /
T02D2542:270b-5: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba //
T02D2542:270b-6: zhes bya zhing khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad
T02D2542:270b-7: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi spros pa mdzad
T02D2542:270b-8: cing zhi ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis 'gro ba
T02D2542:270b-9: rnams kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du mdzad pa
T02D2542:270b-10: ni / phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
T02D2542:270b-11: ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02D2542:270b-13: lha yi dbang po lha yi lha //
T02D2542:270b-14: zhes pa ni de la lha ni bde byed la
T02D2542:270b-15: sogs pa yin la de'i lha ni lha'i dbang po
T02D2542:270b-17: de'i lha ni dbang phyug chen po yin la /
T02D2542:270b-18: dbang phyug chen po'i lha ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do //
T02D2542:270b-19: de ltar bde ba chen po 'dis kyang 'jig rten
T02D2542:270b-20: pa'i dngos grub phun sum tshogs pa ster bar byed
T02D2542:270b-21: pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub
T02D2542:270b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa ster bar
T02D2542:270b-23: byed ces bya bar dgongs so //
T02D2542:270b-24: de lta bu'i dngos grub phun sum tshogs pa ster bar byed pa'i bdag por gyur pa dang /
T02D2542:270b-25: lha ma yin gyi sgras ni mi skyo ba zhes bya la /
T02D2542:270b-26: de la skyo ba ni sems rang gi ngo bo
T02D2542:270b-27: las phyi rol gyi mi ma yin pa la sogs
T02D2542:270b-28: pas sems bsgyur te rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba
T02D2542:270b-29: byed pa ltar tha mal pa'i gnas skabs sems rang
T02D2542:270b-30: bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa nyid du phyin ci
T02D2542:270b-31: log gi mngon par zhen pa'i stobs kyis gzung ba
T02D2542:270b-32: dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag 'gog par
T02D2542:270b-33: gyur pa'i bdag por gyur pa gang yin pa de
T02D2542:270b-34: la / lha yi dbang po lha min bdag / ces pa nyid de //
T02D2542:270b-35: 'chi med dbang po lha yi bla //
T02D2542:270b-36: zhes pa ni bde ba chen po'i spros pa dang
T02D2542:270b-37: bral ba'i mtshan nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa'i rkyen
T02D2542:270b-38: las byung ba 'chi 'gog ltar byed pa dang /
T02D2542:270b-39: mi 'chi ba la dbang ba ster bar byed pa
T02D2542:270b-40: bla mar gyur pa gang yin pa de la de
T02D2542:270b-42: de'i stobs kyis bdud dang dbang phyug la sogs ba
T02D2542:270b-43: rab tu 'joms shing nyon mongs pa mtha' dag 'joms
T02D2542:270b-46: zhes bya la de nyid kyi srid pa'i 'joms pa chen po rab tu rgal bar gyur pa ni //
T02D2542:270b-47: srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba //
T02D2542:271a-1: lhan cig skyes pa'i zhi ba gang yin pa de
T02D2542:271a-2: la bdag nyid gcig pu'i bla ma zhes bya ba
T02D2542:271a-3: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon
T02D2542:271a-4: tan phun sum tshogs pa ster bar byed ba'i bla
T02D2542:271a-5: mar gyur ba gang yin ba de la /
T02D2542:271a-6: ston pa gcig bu 'gro ba'i bla //
T02D2542:271a-7: zhes bya ba la de nyid stong gsum gyi stong
T02D2542:271a-8: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ye
T02D2542:271a-9: shes chen por rab tu gnas par gyur pa dang
T02D2542:271a-10: / sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang mi 'jigs pa
T02D2542:271a-11: la sogs ba thams cad ster bar byed pa'i phyir
T02D2542:271a-12: bdag bor gyur pa de la /
T02D2542:271a-13: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
T02D2542:271a-14: chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po //
T02D2542:271a-16: bde ba chen po bzhi pa 'di nyid dpa' bo
T02D2542:271a-17: go cha dang ldan pas rab tu mi zad pa'i
T02D2542:271a-18: mtshon thogs te / pha rol gyi dpung thams cad 'dul bar bstan pa ni /
T02D2542:271a-19: byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste //
T02D2542:271a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:271a-21: khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la rab tu
T02D2542:271a-22: phan par 'dod pa bdag nyid du gnas pa gang
T02D2542:271a-23: yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing sems
T02D2542:271a-24: can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal la nye bar dmigs
T02D2542:271a-25: ba la mandala gyi tshul du bgos bas thams cad
T02D2542:271a-26: shes rab ral gri dang mda' gzhu'i tshul thogs te
T02D2542:271a-27: / 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i tshogs
T02D2542:271a-28: ni rnam par g-yeng ba'i tshul gyi g-yul ngo yin
T02D2542:271a-29: la rab tu sel bar mdzad pa gang yin pa
T02D2542:271a-30: / de ni / snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos //
T02D2542:271a-31: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
T02D2542:271a-32: nyon mongs mi shes g-yul ngo sel //
T02D2542:271a-34: de lta bu'i bde ba chen po de nyid gzhom
T02D2542:271a-35: pa'i rnam par rtog pa mtha' dag rtog pa med
T02D2542:271a-37: bdag la gnod par byed pa'i bdud kyi dgra thams cad thul bar gyur pa dang /
T02D2542:271a-38: da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed pa dang /
T02D2542:271a-39: bdud kyi dpung thams cad pham par byed pas na /
T02D2542:271a-40: dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba //
T02D2542:271a-41: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed //
T02D2542:271a-42: bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa //
T02D2542:271a-44: de lta bu'i spros pa dang bral ba'i bde ba
T02D2542:271a-45: chen pos mi mthun pa'i tshogs mtha' dag rab tu
T02D2542:271a-46: bcil nas de'i skad cig ma'i yon tan chen po'i
T02D2542:271b-0: zhes pa la sogs @271b ba gsungs te /
T02D2542:271b-1: gnyis su med par mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2542:271b-2: kyis bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su
T02D2542:271b-3: rdzogs shing 'jig rten pa thar pa chen po'i grong
T02D2542:271b-4: khyer du 'dren par mdzad pa gang yin pa de
T02D2542:271b-5: la de skad ces bya zhing /
T02D2542:271b-6: de nyid la drin chen po'i tshul gyis spos dang /
T02D2542:271b-7: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02D2542:271b-8: yon tan bsngags pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa dang /
T02D2542:271b-9: yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba'i gnas su gyur pas na /
T02D2542:271b-12: de ltar gnyis su med pa'i ye shes spros pa
T02D2542:271b-13: dang bral ba gang yin pa de dus rtag tu
T02D2542:271b-14: yid la gus par rab tu bya ba dang /
T02D2542:271b-15: rjes su bsngags pa'i tshul gyis yon tan gyi tshogs brjod par bya ba dang /
T02D2542:271b-16: lus dang ngag dang yid kyis phyag bya ba'i gnas
T02D2542:271b-17: bla ma'i rab tu gyur pa gang yin pa de
T02D2542:271b-18: la / rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os //
T02D2542:271b-19: bkur 'os mchod par bya ba'i mchog /
T02D2542:271b-20: phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
T02D2542:271b-22: de ltar bkur sti dang rim gro thams cad kyi
T02D2542:271b-23: gnas su gyur pa de la yon tan ji lta
T02D2542:271b-24: bu zhe na / 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod //
T02D2542:271b-25: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:271b-26: de la 'jig rten gsum ni 'dod pa dang /
T02D2542:271b-29: sa 'og dang sa steng dang sa bla gsum yin /
T02D2542:271b-30: de thams cad bde ba chen po'i skad cig ma
T02D2542:271b-31: las spros pa dang bral ba'i dngos po 'dod pa
T02D2542:271b-32: gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing
T02D2542:271b-33: / de nyid nam mkha' ltar mtha' yas shing dpag
T02D2542:271b-34: tu med pa rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag
T02D2542:271b-36: mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon //
T02D2542:271b-38: de nyid la lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa drug gis 'das pa dang /
T02D2542:271b-40: da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum yang dag par rig bar gyur cing /
T02D2542:271b-41: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la sogs pa rjes
T02D2542:271b-42: su dran pa dag gi bdag nyid du gnas pa
T02D2542:271b-44: gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa sta /
T02D2542:271b-45: mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug / ces bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:271b-46: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2542:272a-0: de la sems dpa'i sgras ni rtag tu 'jug @272a * //
T02D2542:272a-1: pha dang gnas pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2542:272a-2: ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid de yang rtag tu
T02D2542:272a-3: mi 'gyur bar gnas shing 'gro ba'i don la rtag
T02D2542:272a-5: chos kyi dbyings mngon par rtogs par gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
T02D2542:272a-6: myur ba nyid du sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen
T02D2542:272a-7: po 'jig rten pa'i chos las yang dag par 'das
T02D2542:272a-8: pa de la / rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das //
T02D2542:272a-10: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha' //
T02D2542:272a-12: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
T02D2542:272a-13: rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba yin la /
T02D2542:272a-14: ye shes kyi yul du gyur pa chos kyi dbyings ni yang dang pa'i mtha' zhes bya ste /
T02D2542:272a-15: de lta bu nyid shes par gyur ba gnyis su
T02D2542:272a-16: med pa'i ye shes ni rnam par rtog pa dang
T02D2542:272a-17: bral ba'i tshul gyis ma nor pa nyid thob pa
T02D2542:272a-19: shes rab kyis ni de nyid thob //
T02D2542:272a-21: de ltar shes pa dang shes bya gcig par gyur
T02D2542:272a-22: pa des bdag dang gzhan rig par gyur ba de
T02D2542:272a-23: la / bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
T02D2542:272a-24: zhes bya zhing de lta bu nus ba chen po
T02D2542:272a-25: dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid kyi khams gsum pa thams
T02D2542:272a-26: cad la sdug bsngal nye bar spong ba'i legs pa'i
T02D2542:272a-27: lam bde ba'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs ba 'gro
T02D2542:272a-28: ba gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i gtso bor gyur la
T02D2542:272a-29: / de lta bu nyid kha zas la sogs pa
T02D2542:272a-30: phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid kun gyis mtshungs pa med
T02D2542:272a-31: cing brjod pa dang bral ba'i ngo bor gnas pa
T02D2542:272a-33: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog / dper bya kun las 'das pa ste //
T02D2542:272a-35: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces bya
T02D2542:272a-36: ba ni de la shes pa ni me long lta
T02D2542:272a-37: bu la sogs pa'i ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D2542:272a-38: pa yin la shes bya ni stong pa nyid la
T02D2542:272a-39: sogs pa dngos po med pa dang /
T02D2542:272a-40: dngos po'i mchog mtha' dag yin te de lta bu
T02D2542:272a-41: yul dang yul can gyi bdag po gtso bor gyur
T02D2542:272a-42: pa ni 'brel pa brgyud pa'i sgo nas de la
T02D2542:272a-44: de lta bu des sangs rgyas chos kyi mtshan dang dpe byad dang stobs dang /
T02D2542:272a-45: mi 'jigs pa rnams ster bar byed pa'i gtso bor gyur pas na /
T02D2542:272a-46: gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste //
T02D2542:272a-48: phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa ;
T02D2542:272a-49: / zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2542:272a-50: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2542:272a-51: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid chos kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2542:272a-52: phyag rgya chen po rnam pa bzhi'i nges pa dang
T02D2542:272a-53: ldan pa'i don phyin ci log par ston pas na
T02D2542:272b-0: de nyid gang @272b du bstan pa ltar bkur sti
T02D2542:272b-1: dang rim gro thams cad kyi gnas sam 'os su
T02D2542:272b-2: gyur pa gang yin pa de la /
T02D2542:272b-3: 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog / ces bya la /
T02D2542:272b-4: nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyis //
T02D2542:272b-5: zhes pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
T02D2542:272b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
T02D2542:272b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rnam pa gsum gyis
T02D2542:272b-8: nges par 'byung ba nyid bgrod pas na theg pa
T02D2542:272b-9: yin la de rnams don gyi don chen po mchog
T02D2542:272b-10: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag
T02D2542:272b-11: pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de la /
T02D2542:272b-12: don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal //
T02D2542:272b-14: ye shes chen po de nyid 'dod pa dang gzugs
T02D2542:272b-15: dang gzugs med ba'i khams gsum du dngos grub chen
T02D2542:272b-16: po yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod bzang por gyur cing
T02D2542:272b-17: / de nyid 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D2542:272b-18: pa'i dngos grub ni bde ba dang ldan bar byed
T02D2542:272b-19: pas na 'byor pa yin la de nyid bsod nams
T02D2542:272b-20: dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed
T02D2542:272b-21: pa gang yin pa de la /
T02D2542:272b-22: 'jig rten gsum na skal bzang che //
T02D2542:272b-23: dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa //
T02D2542:272b-25: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog / ces bya
T02D2542:272b-26: ba 'dis ni 'jam dpal nyid nges par gzung ba
T02D2542:272b-27: ste / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes 'di nyid
T02D2542:272b-28: kyang stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i
T02D2542:272b-29: mtshan nyid bde ba chen po'i sku 'jam dpal zhes
T02D2542:272b-30: ste / bstan pa ste / de ltar de bzhin
T02D2542:272b-31: gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi bdag nyid
T02D2542:272b-32: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes nges pa'i tshul du
T02D2542:272b-35: // / da ni ye shes rnam pa lnga ngo bo
T02D2542:272b-36: las byung ba'i 'gro ba rnams 'dul ba'i skur gyur
T02D2542:272b-37: pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la bstod pa ni
T02D2542:272b-38: / mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02D2542:272b-39: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:272b-40: de la me mong lta bu'i ye shes las byung
T02D2542:272b-41: ba de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi mi bskyod
T02D2542:272b-42: ba ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bo gyur cing
T02D2542:272b-43: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes mchog tu mi 'gyur
T02D2542:272b-44: ba'i de kho na nyid ster bar mdzad pas mchog
T02D2542:272b-46: de la yang dag bar bstod ces bya ba'i tha chig go //
T02D2542:272b-47: de lta bu'i de nyid yang dag pa'i mthar 'gyur
T02D2542:272b-48: ba'i gtso bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2542:272b-49: pa las byung zhing skad cig ma gcig la mngon
T02D2542:272b-50: par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T02D2542:273a-0: rnam pa lngas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang rnam pa nyi shus mngon @273a * //
T02D2542:273a-1: par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T02D2542:273a-2: sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
T02D2542:273a-3: pa las yang dag bar byung zhing khyod ces bya
T02D2542:273a-4: ba'i sgra ni de kho na nyid kyi sgras brjod
T02D2542:273a-5: la / de lta bu'i mtshan nyid la bstod par gyur pa ni //
T02D2542:273a-6: yang dag mthar gyur khyod la bstod //
T02D2542:273a-7: stong nying las byung khyod la bstod //
T02D2542:273a-8: sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la bstod //
T02D2542:273a-10: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid de
T02D2542:273a-11: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag
T02D2542:273a-12: pa 'od dpag med la yang dag par bstod pa
T02D2542:273a-13: ni / sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la bstod //
T02D2542:273a-15: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa de nyid
T02D2542:273a-16: chags pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi don du
T02D2542:273a-17: padma rigs kyi gtso bo chags pa chen po'i bdag
T02D2542:273a-19: de nyid bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid yin pas na /
T02D2542:273a-20: sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal bstod / ces bya zhing /
T02D2542:273a-21: de nyid dgyes pa chen po nyid du gyur pa dang /
T02D2542:273a-22: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rol pa chen por gyur pa gang yin pa de la /
T02D2542:273a-23: sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la bstod //
T02D2542:273a-24: sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2542:273a-26: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid la
T02D2542:273a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan chen
T02D2542:273a-28: po'i sku bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan la
T02D2542:273a-29: bstod pa ni / sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la bstod //
T02D2542:273a-31: 'dzum pa zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i
T02D2542:273a-32: 'bras bu gdul bya la nges par brtson par bya
T02D2542:273a-33: ba'i ming byed pa la btags te /
T02D2542:273a-34: nga rgyal chen po'i bdag nyid yid bzhin gyi nor
T02D2542:273a-35: bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyi khams gsum pa thams
T02D2542:273a-36: cad la sbyin pa phun sum tshogs par mdzad pas
T02D2542:273a-37: yi rangs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bzhin rab tu 'dzum
T02D2542:273a-38: pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya
T02D2542:273a-39: zhing / de nyid las sgra dang ldan pa'i mtshan
T02D2542:273a-40: nyid kyis bgad cing bstod pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i
T02D2542:273a-42: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
T02D2542:273a-43: yon tan las gyur pa khams gsum pa thams cad
T02D2542:273a-44: kyi yi rang bar byed pa gang yin pa de
T02D2542:273a-45: la / sangs rgyas bzhad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2542:273a-46: sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la bstod //
T02D2542:273a-47: sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2542:273b-0: bya ba grub ba'i ye @273b shes kyi bdag nyid
T02D2542:273b-1: las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las
T02D2542:273b-2: kyi sku don yod grub pa la bstod pa /
T02D2542:273b-3: med pa las byung khyod la bstod //
T02D2542:273b-5: phrag dog chen po'i skus de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2542:273b-6: cad kyi phrin las kyi bya ba yongs su rdzogs
T02D2542:273b-7: pa'i mtshan nyid gdul bya rnams la phrin las rnam
T02D2542:273b-8: pa sna tshogs pa mdzad pa'i skur snang ba gang
T02D2542:273b-9: yin pa de nyid bya ba byas pa'i tshul gang
T02D2542:273b-10: yin ba de la de skad ces bya zhing /
T02D2542:273b-11: theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i don la
T02D2542:273b-12: yid rab tu mgu zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang ldan
T02D2542:273b-13: pas dpral bar thal mo sbyar te rgyu dang lam
T02D2542:273b-14: gyi sems can thams cad kyi mgon por gyur pa
T02D2542:273b-15: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par
T02D2542:273b-16: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal
T02D2542:273b-17: lo // 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya bar bstan pa ni /
T02D2542:273b-18: dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar //
T02D2542:273b-19: mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2542:273b-20: rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2542:273b-22: de ni mgon po gsang ba'i bdag / ces pa ni tshig dang po nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D2542:273b-23: de la khams gsum pa thams cad kyi mngon mdzad pas na mgon po yin la /
T02D2542:273b-24: de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i
T02D2542:273b-25: bdag po gang yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D2542:273b-26: bya zhing / lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal //
T02D2542:273b-28: de la lag na rdo rje ni gsang ba'i bdag po yin la /
T02D2542:273b-29: khro bo'i rgyal zhes pa ni ma ning gi rtags te /
T02D2542:273b-30: dngos gzhi 'di nyid las nges par sbyar ba ni
T02D2542:273b-31: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khro bo'i
T02D2542:273b-32: rgyal po mgon po de ni zhes bya ba dmigs
T02D2542:273b-33: pa nye bar 'dzin pa'i tshig go //
T02D2542:273b-34: ci gsang ba'i bdag po de kho nas sam she na ma yin te /
T02D2542:273b-35: sna tshogs gzhan dang lhan cig tu //
T02D2542:273b-36: gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol // zhes gsungs te /
T02D2542:273b-37: rdo rje'i rigs kyi khro bo'i rgyal po gzhan sna
T02D2542:273b-38: tshogs pa dang lhan cig tu yid mngon par dga'
T02D2542:273b-39: ba'i tshul gyis gzengs bstod nas /
T02D2542:273b-40: ngag tu tshig 'di skad ces bstod do zhes bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:273b-41: tshig gi don ji lta bus bstod ce na /
T02D2542:273b-42: mgon po bdag cag yi rang ngo //
T02D2542:273b-43: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2542:273b-44: de la mgon po zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bod pa'i tshig yin la /
T02D2542:273b-45: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa zab mo'i don la yid mngon par dga'o zhes bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:274a-0: @274a * // legs so legs so legs par gsungs //
T02D2542:274a-2: ma ning gi rtags ston pa rnams kyi gsum la bstod pa dang /
T02D2542:274a-3: dbang dang grub ba dang 'bras bu la bstod ba ste /
T02D2542:274a-4: de la zab mo'i don 'di nyid de bzhin gshegs
T02D2542:274a-5: ba rnams dang ma 'ongs ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2542:274a-6: rnams dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs ba dang /
T02D2542:274a-7: gsung bar 'gyur ba nyid legs so zhes pa dang /
T02D2542:274a-8: thog mar skad cing ma'i bde ba dang legs pa dang /
T02D2542:274a-9: bar du dus kyi bde ba dang legs pa dang /
T02D2542:274a-10: mtha' mar rgyun gyi bde ba dang legs pa gang
T02D2542:274a-11: yin pa de la legs so zhes bya ba byin
T02D2542:274a-12: te / ji lta bu'i tshul gyis legs snyam ba la /
T02D2542:274a-13: rnam grol 'bras bu'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2542:274a-14: 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni //
T02D2542:274a-15: bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi //
T02D2542:274a-16: byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad //
T02D2542:274a-18: de la rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa ni ma ning gi rtags can te /
T02D2542:274a-19: don chen gnyis la go bar bya zhing /
T02D2542:274a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D2542:274a-21: sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa gzugs rnams
T02D2542:274a-22: pa sna tshogs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de'i
T02D2542:274a-26: sprul pa'i sku de nyid chos kyi sku rnam rtog
T02D2542:274a-27: thams cad dang bral ba nam mkha' ltar mtha' yas
T02D2542:274a-28: pa'i mtshan nyid las byung ba /
T02D2542:274a-29: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ye shes chen po'i ros
T02D2542:274a-30: yongs su gang ba'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs
T02D2542:274a-31: pa'i bdag nyid las byung ba gang yin ba de
T02D2542:274a-32: la / nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2542:274a-33: ye shes las byung khyod la bstod //
T02D2542:274a-35: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2542:274a-36: thams cad kyi gti mug chen po'i sku rnam par
T02D2542:274a-37: snang mdzad la bstod pa ni /
T02D2542:274a-38: sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la bstod //
T02D2542:274a-40: de la sgyu 'phrul ni med pa'i dngos po la rnam pa sna tshogs par snang ba yin la /
T02D2542:274a-41: dra ba ni phyogs bzhi thag pa las mdud pa'i
T02D2542:274a-42: tshul du dkyil na gnas pa phyogs kun tu sprel
T02D2542:274a-43: ba yin te / de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings
T02D2542:274a-44: ye shes spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid las phyogs
T02D2542:274a-45: thams cad du rigs dang mthun pa'i sku nye bar
T02D2542:274a-46: ston pa gsal zhing 'bar bas rigs bzhi'i gtso bor
T02D2542:274a-47: gyur pas dbus na bzhugs pa gang yin pa de
T02D2542:274a-48: la de skad ces bya zhing /
T02D2542:274b-0: de nyid dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yab kyi tshul du bzhugs pa @274b dang ;
T02D2542:274b-1: de bzhin gshegs ba'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
T02D2542:274b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyis gus pa
T02D2542:274b-3: dang ldan pa'i tshul gyis kun du zhal du mngon
T02D2542:274b-4: par phyogs par gyur pa dang /
T02D2542:274b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
T02D2542:274b-6: sku sngags pa chen po'i tshul gyis bstod pa gang
T02D2542:274b-8: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la bstod //
T02D2542:274b-9: thams cad thams cad khyod la bstod //
T02D2542:274b-10: ye shes sku nyid khyod la bstod //
T02D2542:274b-12: de ltar rig drug gi bdag nyid yin pas bsdu
T02D2542:274b-13: ba dang bcas pa bstan cing thabs dang shes rab
T02D2542:274b-14: kyi sngags rnam pa gnyis kyang sgrub pa'i thabs kyi
T02D2542:274b-15: skabs su rgyas bar bstan nas /
T02D2542:274b-16: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang bka' zab mo'i
T02D2542:274b-17: don 'di nyid kyi zhu ba po sa bcu'i dbang
T02D2542:274b-18: phyug gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang
T02D2542:274b-19: / de'i 'khor du gyur pa rdo rje 'chang ba
T02D2542:274b-20: dpag tu med pa rnams dang rjes su yi rangs
T02D2542:274b-21: shing mngon par dga' ba'i tshul gyis bstod ba ni
T02D2542:274b-22: / / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02D2542:274b-23: zhes pa la sogs ba gsungs te /
T02D2542:274b-24: de la de nas zhes pa ni /
T02D2542:274b-25: bkra shis pa'i tshul gyis 'das pa nye bar rdzogs pa ste /
T02D2542:274b-26: shes rab kyi sngags brjod pa rdzogs pa'i rjes la zhes bya ba yin la /
T02D2542:274b-28: rdo rje 'chang ni gang du bshad zin la /
T02D2542:274b-29: don gyis na gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje /
T02D2542:274b-30: 'gro ba mgon med pa ni mi la sogs pa
T02D2542:274b-31: ngan 'gro'i rgyud dang ldan pa thams cad yin la
T02D2542:274b-32: / bdag cag ces ba ni gsang ba'i bdag po
T02D2542:274b-33: la sogs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu'i
T02D2542:274b-35: gdul bya'i don du rgyu la rag las pa ltar
T02D2542:274b-36: bstan pa ni de rnam dang bdag cag yang gad
T02D2542:274b-37: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byed ba'i don
T02D2542:274b-38: chen po mdzad ces bya ba nyid do //
T02D2542:274b-39: de la rtsa ba'i rgyud las gang gsungs snyam pa la //
T02D2542:274b-40: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D2542:274b-42: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di nyid rgyud chen
T02D2542:274b-43: po stod phrag bcu drug pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i
T02D2542:274b-44: tshul ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa gang yin
T02D2542:274b-45: pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
T02D2542:274b-46: de nyid rnam bar dag pa'i dri ma dang brla
T02D2542:274b-47: ba'i lam du gyur pa dang rtogs par dga' zhing
T02D2542:274b-48: 'bras bu'i don rgya chen por gyur pa dang ldan
T02D2542:274b-49: pa dang / bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2542:275a-0: @275a * // gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa grub ba de nyid zab mo'i don 'di ste /
T02D2542:275a-1: 'di ni rnam dag legs ba'i lam //
T02D2542:275a-2: zab cing yangs la rgya che ste //
T02D2542:275a-3: don chen 'gro ba'i don byed ba nyid do //
T02D2542:275a-4: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni //
T02D2542:275a-5: zhes bya ba ni de la yul ni 'dod pa'i
T02D2542:275a-6: yul yin la de bzhin du 'dod pa'i don 'di
T02D2542:275a-7: nyid dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D2542:275a-8: kyi 'dod bar bya ba'i yul yin bas na de
T02D2542:275a-10: 'di nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pas na /
T02D2542:275a-11: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad //
T02D2542:275a-13: de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa zab mo'i don de chos kyi dbyings dang /
T02D2542:275a-14: ye shes gnyis su med ba don dam pa nyid
T02D2542:275a-15: yang dag par glur blangs pa gang yin pa de
T02D2542:275a-16: ni mtshan bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems
T02D2542:275a-17: dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa
T02D2542:275a-18: zhes bya la / 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das sh'akya
T02D2542:275a-19: thub pas gsungs pas so zhes bya ba nyid do
T02D2542:275a-20: zhes bya la / // rdzogs ldan sangs rgya thams cad kyis //
T02D2542:275a-21: don dam snying po gtsor gyur pa //
T02D2542:275a-22: sgribs g-yogs skye bo thams cad kyi //
T02D2542:275a-23: mun pa bsal phyir legs byas ba'i //
T02D2542:275a-24: dge ba rgya chen gang thob des //
T02D2542:275a-25: 'gro ba skye ba'i tshogs kun dang //
T02D2542:275a-26: bdag nyid dri ma gsum spangs nas //
T02D2542:275a-27: bde chen rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig / bstan gcos 'di yi tshad gyur pa //
T02D2542:275a-28: tshigs su bcad pa stong dang ni //
T02D2542:275a-29: drug brgya lnga bcu tham par bsgyur //
T02D2542:275a-30: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa /
T02D2542:275a-31: slob dpon chen po phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub
T02D2542:275a-32: brnyes pa dombi he ru ka'i zhal snga nas mdzad
T02D2542:275a-34: / bod kyi lo ts'a ba khyud grags kyis bsgyur bar grags pa'o //
T02D2542:275a-35: sa pho spre'u dpyid zla tha chungs yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la /
T02D2542:275a-36: gza' mig mar gyi nyin par dbang phyug dam pa'i
T02D2542:275a-37: mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po khri dbang phyug rin
T02D2542:275a-38: po che don thams cad sgrub pa'i bka' lung gis
T02D2542:275a-39: / rgyal mo sum bu bra lun gyi 'od zer gyis sku gnyer mdzad nas /
T02D2542:275a-40: bkra shis kyi gdan sa chen po //
T02D2542:275a-41: tsong ka ser to bla khar gyi nang du bod
T02D2542:275a-42: kyi lo ts'a ba khyud grags kyis 'jam dpal sgyu
